story:
WE ARE CURRENTLY RUNNING A SECOND ROUND OF THIS CAMPAIGN HERE: http://igg.me/at/popup-book-2

A VERY SPECIAL THANK YOU TO EVERYONE WHO KINDLY SUPPORTED OUR CAMPAIGN AND HELPED US BRING OUR DREAM TO MAKE STORIES FROM THE QURAN COME TO LIFE IN POP-UP & 3D! 

WE'RE BUSY GETTING THE PRODUCTION STARTED TO BRING YOU ALL YOUR LOVELY POP-UP BOOKS & REWARDS IN TIME FOR EID IN JULY 2014


Pop-up Book includes quiz, colouring play mat and press-out activity

                       The perfect gift for children you love.
In 570 A.D. Yemen, the tyrant ruler Abraha leads his army of elephants to destroy God’s House, the Ka’ba in the Holy city of Makkah. Armed with only prayers, the Arabs rely on their faith and trust in God to save the Ka’ba and discover some unexpected miracles along the way!

About our Founder and Author

Salaam / Hello, I'm Hajera, the founder of Shade 7; a new publisher of high quality Pop-up Quranic educational story books & interactive digital 3D apps that help children learn about Islam in a fun way.

I trained and qualified as a banking lawyer in the heart of London. In the summer of 2012, I decided to quit my job and spend my life doing something I was extremely passionate about. I knew I wanted to explore my creative side! 

I had a good think about all the things I’d like to do in my life and thought, if I could do ANYTHING IN THE WORLD, what would it be?

Who could I become that would bring the most benefit to the world as a Muslim woman? I really wanted establish something which would allow me to leave a legacy behind.

Some key things came to mind:

  1. On-going beneficial knowledge;
  2. ‘Sadaqah jariyah’ (ceaseless charity); and 
  3. The hadith, or Prophetic saying that “Seven types of people will be shaded by God under His shade on the day when there will be no shade except His.”

Putting knowledge into action

I wanted to turn these key Islamic principles into actions and really make a difference. I'm determined to use my life to create a real legacy in children's Islamic education, not just for me, but for everyone involved.

Why It's Important We Gain YOUR Support!

We need your support to make our vision a reality and create a real legacy in children's Islamic educational publishing! 

  • Our vision is to create a legacy of accessible, high quality resources of on-going, beneficial knowledge which aim to (God Willing) inspire generations to come.
  • We’ve tried to find beautiful, creative and interactive resources that can encourage children to learn more about the magnificent stories from the Holy Quran. 
  • All the adults we’d spoken to had very fond memories of reading pop-up books as children and told us they’d love to have the same resources to teach their children more about the Quran.

  • We invite you to support us, to pre-order your exclusive signed copy and be a part of the Shade 7 legacy to make our vision a reality for all children to enjoy!

    • Features of the book: Why it's so special!

    • Hand drawn & painted, creative illustrations with exceptional colour and design throughout the book
    • A variety of carefully thought out pop-up features, interactive flaps and tabs to really bring the story to life like never before
    • Educational quiz to test your knowledge of the story 
    • Colouring play mat and press-out pieces to create your own army of elephants to re-enact some of the historic scenes from the story
    • Hardback cover with high quality finish throughout
    • Beautiful, luxurious, gold foil stamped, hand designed title on the cover
    • Our book is double the size of a standard children’s pop-up story book, containing 13 spreads
    • Each of the pop-up features in the book are put together by hand

    What We Need & What You Get

    We need to raise £40,000 to help us with the initial production costs of 5,000 copies of our magnificent Pop-up Story of The Elephant: Surah Al-Fil Pop-up Book to arrive God willing, in time for Eid 2014. 

    That's just 1185 more people pre-ordering our special book for only £26 including UK postage!

    The Pop-up Development Process

    Pop-up books require a large amount of expensive tooling in order to be produced and the assembly is nearly all manual labour, making the production costs per unit higher than traditional book printing.

    That's why we need your support! 

    What You Get

    In exchange and as a THANK YOU for being a part of our legacy, we have some really creative special perks for you. 

    We also have additional exclusive benefits for all our initial supporters from this crowd-funding campaign.

    All supporters purchasing a book will:

    • Form an exclusive online community, receiving previews of future titles before they are released;
    • Have the opportunity to pre-order the next title and limited edition versions before we take them to market; and 
    • Receive exclusive updates on the development of the 3D digital interactive Story of The Elephant: Surah Al-Fil App.

    *Our tentative delivery is expected just before Eid Al Fitr 2014 and email notices will be provided if any short delays surface.

    **Please note that the delivery charges for overseas orders may vary – please see the destinations list below for more accurate shipping details. 

    We're all about Storytelling that touches for a lifetime, making a better world for people of all faiths.

    Testimonials, Partners & Supporters

    As a young, ambitious  new publishing venture, we've received some incredible feedback from world-renowned international publishing houses, both mainstream and Islamic, who really value the contribution we are trying to make to the children's educational publishing world! 

    My team and I have worked incredibly hard to produce some of the best quality, creative and innovative Pop-up books & 3D apps around, to teach children about Quranic and Prophetic stories in fun, interactive and memorable way.

    The Story of The Elephant, Surah Al-Fil Pop-up, is the first in our series and, if we get funded (God willing), we have plenty more Pop-up titles to come.

    It’s important to also emphasise, acknowledge and thank all the members of our team, friends, parents and children that have worked extremely hard to help us make the progress we've made and reach this stage. 

    The Impact

    This project is much more than just publishing children’s Quranic Pop-up Books and 3D apps. It has a much deeper impact and intention for the future of children’s Islamic educational publishing.

    We’ve summarised the 7 key things which our project is all about: 

    1. Creating a Legacy of outstandingly beautiful, long-lasting resources to pass on beneficial knowledge that teaches children about the importance of faith and the rich, valuable lessons from the stories in the Quran.
    2. Creating Exceptional and inspirational designs of the highest quality in the material we publish.
    3. Making our published materials Accessible to all children, from all backgrounds and faiths to enjoy. This is highlighted particularly through our commitment with our Charity Partner READ Foundation who champion education for all.  
    4. Igniting a curiosity in all children to Discover the profound and exciting and moral stories in the Qur’an. For Muslim children, we hope it will inspire the discovery into the beauty of the Arabic language to understand the depth of these stories further.
    5. Creating innovative Educational resources to make learning about Islam truly inspiring and fun for all.
    6. Developing a deeper sense of Respect and tolerance in children from an early age towards other faiths and beliefs, bridging gaps and highlighting the similarities in the stories of the Old Testament to the Quranic stories in particular – something which will develop further as our series progresses.
    7. Developing a child’s Spiritual needs and interests as they grow older, cultivating an awareness of their Creator and creating a bond with Him through fond memories of reading these sensational stories.

    To date, many have sacrificed an incredible amount of time, goodwill and shown real belief and support in the worthwhile nature of this project. All the work on the book, from the illustrations, to the graphics, to the website, to all the important logistical stuff that no one really gets to see, like the accounts, legalities, advising and mentoring has ALL been done for FREE!

    We feel truly blessed and thankful for everyone that's supported and worked with us to be a part of our journey so far.  

    We’ve got some really exciting titles in our line-up for the Qur’anic Pop-up book series to bring to market if (God Willing) this campaign is successful!

    Our Charitable Commitment 

    At Shade 7 we firmly believe in supporting the religious, spiritual and educational development of all children.

    Our commitment is to donate a minimum of 25 books for every 1,000 copies sold as gifts to less fortunate children around the world via our Charity Partner READ Foundation (Registered Charity Number 1114808) whose focus is on education for children in rural areas.


    We’d love for you to help us deliver on our promise to help make less fortunate children really happy too!

    We invite you to consider giving another child an opportunity to write their name on a copy of this beautiful book and have something of their own to treasure!

    We invite you to consider giving another child an opportunity to write their name on a copy of this beautiful book and have something of their own to treasure!

    IMPORTANT NOTE RE POSTAGE FOR ALL UK ORDERS ONLY: 

    • All UK orders include shipping costs within the offer itself. 
    • All UK orders will be sent by a special delivery, fully tracked service. 
    • As each book weighs over 1kg, we are able to offer a flat rate of £6.20 shipping for up to 30 books in the UK and we have already included this in the price of the offers for ease. 

    ***Please note we will be developing parts of the book and, in particular, the front cover further, once we have been able to secure funding, so your final copy will (God Willing) look even better than the prototype shown on screen!

    About the 3D Interactive App

    All of these images have been 3D modelled on computer and are not photographs of paper models

    If we raise enough support, we want to create an exceptional App, with great graphics mimicking the paper-engineered feel of the books and incorporate a level of interactivity that both parents and children will enjoy.  

    Parents will also have an option to record their own voice on the Surah Al-Fil App so the child can hear the story in a familiar voice when mum or dad might not be free to sit and read with them.

    There’ll also be plenty of other special treats in store!

    “Imagine seeing the birds carrying the stones, flying out from a three dimensional surface in a digital form on an iPad or child’s tablet. And more than that, this exciting way of reading a book engages children because it is interactive, with pages turning when they touch the screen.

    Fons Vitae is proud to be part of such a splendid enterprise.”

    Sayyida Aisha Virginia Gray Henry

    Director, Fons Vitae Publishing and Distribution

    Children's Testimonials

    Here are some of our favourite reactions and quotes from children reviewing the book. They really made us laugh and we can’t wait to put the book into production for them and many other children to enjoy!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We believe (God Willing) EVERYONE can be a part of the Shade 7 legacy!

    You don’t have to contribute financially if you’re unable to, but what we would urge you to do is PLEASE, SHARE, TWEET, EMAIL and SPREAD THE WORD about our magnificent publishing project to all your nearest and dearest! 

    We believe reward is given by the intention, so even if you forward this link to someone who pledges while you haven’t been able to, God willing you’ll still get the reward for it too! This is from the beauty and generosity of our Lord!

    We would also like to make the humble request that you remember the entire Shade 7 team, all the wonderful children and their parents that have been involved and the whole project in your prayers. This doesn’t cost you anything but a bit of time and this in itself is something we believe is extremely valuable and powerful because it is with continued prayers that we have come this far to begin with!

    God willing, we will reach our goal and create a platform to enable us all to leave behind a truly special and beneficial legacy for the generations to come!

    And finally, we’d like to say a HUGE THANK YOU from the Shade 7 team to EVERYONE for their support throughout our journey so far!

    Trade Enquiries

    For all trade enquiries, retail, wholesale and distribution orders, for further information on the volume discounts available and to place your pre-orders, please visit our website to place your pre-orders: http://shade7.co.uk/order-now/ or email: wholesale@shade7.co.uk

    • Please note the minimum order for ***RETAILERS*** is 14 books (1 carton)
    • Please note the minimum order for ***WHOLESALERS*** is 140 books (10 cartons)
    • For those interested in ***UK and WORLDWIDE DISTRIBUTION*** opportunities, please email as per above. 

    A set of our full terms and conditions with available discounts will be sent upon enquiry.

    Please allow up to 5 working days for someone to reply to your query. 

    International Postage

story_txt:
WE ARE CURRENTLY RUNNING A SECOND ROUND OF THIS CAMPAIGN HERE: http://igg.me/at/popup-book-2


A VERY SPECIAL THANK YOU TO EVERYONE WHO KINDLY SUPPORTED OUR CAMPAIGN AND HELPED US BRING OUR DREAM TO MAKE STORIES FROM THE QURAN COME TO LIFE IN POP-UP & 3D! 
WE'RE BUSY GETTING THE PRODUCTION STARTED TO BRING YOU ALL YOUR LOVELY POP-UP BOOKS & REWARDS IN TIME FOR EID IN JULY 2014

Pop-up Book includes quiz, colouring play mat and press-out activity                       The perfect gift for children you love.
In 570 A.D. Yemen, the tyrant ruler Abraha leads his army of elephants to destroy God’s House, the Ka’ba in the Holy city of Makkah. Armed with only prayers, the Arabs rely on their faith and trust in God to save the Ka’ba and discover some unexpected miracles along the way!
About our Founder and AuthorSalaam / Hello, I'm Hajera, the founder of Shade 7; a new publisher of high quality Pop-up Quranic educational story books & interactive digital 3D apps that help children learn about Islam in a fun way.I trained and qualified as a banking lawyer in the heart of London. In the summer of 2012, I decided to quit my job and spend my life doing something I was extremely passionate about. I knew I wanted to explore my creative side! I had a good think about all the things I’d like to do in my life and thought, if I could do ANYTHING IN THE WORLD, what would it be?Who could I become that would bring the most benefit to the world as a Muslim woman? I really wanted establish something which would allow me to leave a legacy behind.Some key things came to mind:
On-going beneficial knowledge;
‘Sadaqah jariyah’ (ceaseless charity); and 
The hadith, or Prophetic saying that “Seven types of people will be shaded by God under His shade on the day when there will be no shade except His.”

Putting knowledge into actionI wanted to turn these key Islamic principles into actions and really make a difference. I'm determined to use my life to create a real legacy in children's Islamic education, not just for me, but for everyone involved.Why It's Important We Gain YOUR Support!We need your support to make our vision a reality and create a real legacy in children's Islamic educational publishing! 
Our vision is to create a legacy of accessible, high quality resources of on-going, beneficial knowledge which aim to (God Willing) inspire generations to come.

We’ve tried to find beautiful, creative and interactive resources that can encourage children to learn more about the magnificent stories from the Holy Quran. 

All the adults we’d spoken to had very fond memories of reading pop-up books as children and told us they’d love to have the same resources to teach their children more about the Quran.
We invite you to support us, to pre-order your exclusive signed copy and be a part of the Shade 7 legacy to make our vision a reality for all children to enjoy!Features of the book: Why it's so special!
Hand drawn & painted, creative illustrations with exceptional colour and design throughout the book
A variety of carefully thought out pop-up features, interactive flaps and tabs to really bring the story to life like never before
Educational quiz to test your knowledge of the story 
Colouring play mat and press-out pieces to create your own army of elephants to re-enact some of the historic scenes from the story
Hardback cover with high quality finish throughout
Beautiful, luxurious, gold foil stamped, hand designed title on the cover
Our book is double the size of a standard children’s pop-up story book, containing 13 spreads
Each of the pop-up features in the book are put together by hand
What We Need & What You GetWe need to raise £40,000 to help us with the initial production costs of 5,000 copies of our magnificent Pop-up Story of The Elephant: Surah Al-Fil Pop-up Book to arrive God willing, in time for Eid 2014. That's just 1185 more people pre-ordering our special book for only £26 including UK postage!The Pop-up Development ProcessPop-up books require a large amount of expensive tooling in order to be produced and the assembly is nearly all manual labour, making the production costs per unit higher than traditional book printing.That's why we need your support! What You GetIn exchange and as a THANK YOU for being a part of our legacy, we have some really creative special perks for you. We also have additional exclusive benefits for all our initial supporters from this crowd-funding campaign.All supporters purchasing a book will:
Form an exclusive online community, receiving previews of future titles before they are released;
Have the opportunity to pre-order the next title and limited edition versions before we take them to market; and 
Receive exclusive updates on the development of the 3D digital interactive Story of The Elephant: Surah Al-Fil App.
*Our tentative delivery is expected just before Eid Al Fitr 2014 and email notices will be provided if any short delays surface.**Please note that the delivery charges for overseas orders may vary – please see the destinations list below for more accurate shipping details. We're all about Storytelling that touches for a lifetime, making a better world for people of all faiths.Testimonials, Partners & SupportersAs a young, ambitious  new publishing venture, we've received some incredible feedback from world-renowned international publishing houses, both mainstream and Islamic, who really value the contribution we are trying to make to the children's educational publishing world! My team and I have worked incredibly hard to produce some of the best quality, creative and innovative Pop-up books & 3D apps around, to teach children about Quranic and Prophetic stories in fun, interactive and memorable way.The Story of The Elephant, Surah Al-Fil Pop-up, is the first in our series and, if we get funded (God willing), we have plenty more Pop-up titles to come.It’s important to also emphasise, acknowledge and thank all the members of our team, friends, parents and children that have worked extremely hard to help us make the progress we've made and reach this stage. The ImpactThis project is much more than just publishing children’s Quranic Pop-up Books and 3D apps. It has a much deeper impact and intention for the future of children’s Islamic educational publishing.We’ve summarised the 7 key things which our project is all about: 
Creating a Legacy of outstandingly beautiful, long-lasting resources to pass on beneficial knowledge that teaches children about the importance of faith and the rich, valuable lessons from the stories in the Quran.
Creating Exceptional and inspirational designs of the highest quality in the material we publish.
Making our published materials Accessible to all children, from all backgrounds and faiths to enjoy. This is highlighted particularly through our commitment with our Charity Partner READ Foundation who champion education for all.  
Igniting a curiosity in all children to Discover the profound and exciting and moral stories in the Qur’an. For Muslim children, we hope it will inspire the discovery into the beauty of the Arabic language to understand the depth of these stories further.
Creating innovative Educational resources to make learning about Islam truly inspiring and fun for all.
Developing a deeper sense of Respect and tolerance in children from an early age towards other faiths and beliefs, bridging gaps and highlighting the similarities in the stories of the Old Testament to the Quranic stories in particular – something which will develop further as our series progresses.
Developing a child’s Spiritual needs and interests as they grow older, cultivating an awareness of their Creator and creating a bond with Him through fond memories of reading these sensational stories.
To date, many have sacrificed an incredible amount of time, goodwill and shown real belief and support in the worthwhile nature of this project. All the work on the book, from the illustrations, to the graphics, to the website, to all the important logistical stuff that no one really gets to see, like the accounts, legalities, advising and mentoring has ALL been done for FREE!We feel truly blessed and thankful for everyone that's supported and worked with us to be a part of our journey so far.  We’ve got some really exciting titles in our line-up for the Qur’anic Pop-up book series to bring to market if (God Willing) this campaign is successful!Our Charitable Commitment At Shade 7 we firmly believe in supporting the religious, spiritual and educational development of all children.Our commitment is to donate a minimum of 25 books for every 1,000 copies sold as gifts to less fortunate children around the world via our Charity Partner READ Foundation (Registered Charity Number 1114808) whose focus is on education for children in rural areas.We’d love for you to help us deliver on our promise to help make less fortunate children really happy too!We invite you to consider giving another child an opportunity to write their name on a copy of this beautiful book and have something of their own to treasure!We invite you to consider giving another child an opportunity to write their name on a copy of this beautiful book and have something of their own to treasure!
IMPORTANT NOTE RE POSTAGE FOR ALL UK ORDERS ONLY: 

All UK orders include shipping costs within the offer itself. 

All UK orders will be sent
by a special delivery, fully tracked service. 

As each book weighs over
1kg, we are able to offer a flat rate of £6.20 shipping for up to 30 books in the
UK and we have already included this in the price of the offers for ease. 

***Please note we will be developing parts of the book and, in
particular, the front cover further, once we have been able to secure funding,
so your final copy will (God Willing) look even better than the prototype shown
on screen!







About the 3D Interactive AppAll of these images have been 3D modelled on computer and are not photographs of paper modelsIf we raise enough support, we want to create an exceptional App, with great graphics mimicking the paper-engineered feel of the books and incorporate a level of interactivity that both parents and children will enjoy.  Parents will also have an option to record their own voice on the Surah Al-Fil App so the child can hear the story in a familiar voice when mum or dad might not be free to sit and read with them.There’ll also be plenty of other special treats in store!“Imagine seeing the birds carrying the stones, flying out from a three dimensional surface in a digital form on an iPad or child’s tablet. And more than that, this exciting way of reading a book engages children because it is interactive, with pages turning when they touch the screen.Fons Vitae is proud to be part of such a splendid enterprise.”Sayyida Aisha Virginia Gray HenryDirector, Fons Vitae Publishing and DistributionChildren's TestimonialsHere are some of our favourite reactions
and quotes from children reviewing the book. They really made us laugh and we
can’t wait to put the book into production for them and many other children to
enjoy!Other Ways You Can HelpWe
believe (God Willing) EVERYONE can be a part of the Shade 7 legacy! 
You
don’t have to contribute financially if you’re unable to, but what we would
urge you to do is PLEASE, SHARE, TWEET, EMAIL and SPREAD THE WORD about our magnificent publishing project to all your nearest and dearest! We believe reward is given by the intention, so even if you forward this link to
someone who pledges while you haven’t been able to, God willing you’ll still
get the reward for it too! This is from the beauty and generosity of our Lord!
We would also like to make the humble request that you remember the entire Shade 7 team, all the wonderful children and their parents that have been involved and the whole project in your prayers. This doesn’t cost you anything but a bit of time and this in itself is something we believe is extremely valuable and powerful because it is with continued prayers that we have come this far to begin with!God
willing, we will reach our goal and create a platform to enable us all to leave
behind a truly special and beneficial legacy for the generations to come!
And
finally, we’d like to say a HUGE THANK YOU from the Shade 7 team to EVERYONE
for their support throughout our journey so far!Trade EnquiriesFor all trade enquiries, retail, wholesale and distribution orders, for further information on the volume discounts available and to place your pre-orders, please visit our website to place your pre-orders: http://shade7.co.uk/order-now/ or email: wholesale@shade7.co.uk
Please note the minimum order for ***RETAILERS*** is 14 books (1 carton)
Please note the minimum order for ***WHOLESALERS*** is 140 books (10 cartons)
For those interested in ***UK and WORLDWIDE DISTRIBUTION*** opportunities, please email as per above. 
A set of our full terms and conditions with available discounts will be sent upon enquiry.Please allow up to 5 working days for someone to reply to your query. International Postage You can find the international shipping rate details for your country through our drop down menu on our website: http://shade7.co.uk/international-shipping-rates/*For international quantities outside of this range or trade enquiries, please email: wholesale@shade7.co.uk   International Zones

story:
Short Summary

I was born and raised in Chicago as a child prodigy in piano performance and composition, and also in drawing, and later on, in dancing. The reason for this “prodigy” upbringing was that I have been diagnosed with ASD around 4 years old. From there, I ended up in Beacon Therapeutic School for about 15 years to help deal with my ASD condition and I also saw plentiful evidence of other classmates having that condition. From watching “Fame” on TV, Debbie Allen became one of my greatest idols to inspire me to dance, so I taught myself ballet, jazz, and modern, even though I kept it secret from my parents because of my ASD. Fortunately, I got my HS diploma in 1990, got a BM in Piano at Roosevelt University in 1994, and then an MM in Piano at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 1995, and got a DMA in Piano at the same university in 2002.

My writing gifts started around 1995 or so, beginning with poetry, then to essays and short stories, with several of them being published online through Digizine.com. Later on, as I watched the movie “Rainman”, I did some more re-tracing on my life as someone with ASD with help from my surviving parents and relatives, and figured that I had lived quite a unique life. For example, in 1996, I fell in love with ballroom dancing and wanted to be almost like ballroom dance champion, Donnie Burns, after seeing the movie, “Shall We Dance?” From there, I got my wish dancing in several amateur ballroom competitions, andmade the finals in a few of them. In addition to that, I was amassing more and more original and arranged compositions, mainly for the piano. And I am still doing this. 

The campaign will focus on my major release of a self-published autobiography that is inspired by my experiences of having ASD. 

From this autobiography, this campaign will most likely be well-received by not only regular people who have ASD, but also famous celebrities who also have been diagnosed with ASD as well. 

What We Need & What You Get

Because I am going to do an autobiography that will likely be print-based as well as online, I was thinking of doing 200 print copies for the book, which will include text and graphics on my own color laser printer (the Dell C1660w), which I will need expensive OEM toner at least 12 times, and the printing costs will run about $6,000. (I ran some non-OEM toner in that printer and regrettably the printer will not accept that paper.) I was also going to send the copies through regular snail mail myself – 200 copies X $15.00 each book for shipping costs—turns out to be an extra $3,000. Then, I plan to get professional business cards and business card resumes, as well as getting extra paper and business cards to promote my project, and use a few Facebook advertisements to boost extra fans and backers for my project, which turns out to be an extra $1,000 in marketing costs.

 Moreover, I know that some people still like to read stuff in the regular way without using an e-reader or e-Book. 

The perks I have will focus on my original music CDs that display my autistic talents for doing almost anything—from doing live performances all the way to doing avant-garde compositions.

If my goal of $10,000 is not reached by the deadline, the funds will still be sent to my Paypal account, where it will be likely be used to pay the needed expenses for my campaign. 

The Impact

The project is very important to me and to the world because I want to express several of my greatest gifts I had as somebody who had ASD—writing, and drawing, as well as music. And also, the topic of ASD is now spread away from the United States to parts of Europe and beyond, and more people are starting to understand this rather tricky condition. I am a very gifted writer and ever since I heard about the amazing story of Carly Fleischmann – whose life with ASD is almost a little bit like my past life – I am using her story as a major inspiration to boost my existing writing gifts. 

This will be my first ever crowdfunding project that helps inspire people with autism. In the past, I had a good track record as an writer during my doctoral dissertation project, wrote numerous published blogs on Blogger.com, and I also had started up a not-for-profit organization along with my co-founder, Lynn West, called Celebration of Joy (established in 2014), whose mission focuses on empowering people with autism. With the release of my autobiography, the non-profit will have a great boost in our fanbase and in our backers. 

Right now, there is no way you can escape being informed about autism. There are more recent news stories in both broadcast and independent media that are covering more topics and discussions related to autism-spectrum disorder, and the revelation of Jenny McCarthy having a son with autism is a major example. Also, the stigma of people having ASD is starting to fade a little bit, and people with ASD are coming up with creative coping mechanisms to live as normal a life as possible, despite the condition. I also had faced autism full-circle in myself and seeing other people with this condition, so this will inspire me to write, and I hope that you will trust me to help me succeed in this project. 

Risks & Challenges

I do know that the main challenge for me are several, not just a single one. The first one is I have continued shyness related to my autism, and this means I am pretty reluctant to announce the Indiegogo campaign by word-of-mouth especially to people on the street that I do not know. 

I am also aware that there is a chance that I will not make the goal of $10,000 as expected especially when you are crowdfunding for the first time. The way I can remedy that is to make sure that I have enough backers on Facebook and outside of Facebook to make this possible. 

Another challenge is that I have a problem with procrastination, and right now, because I am doing some heavy editing and it involves a lot of proofreading page-by-page, and line-by-line (which is very time-consuming), this might mean an outside chance that the biography will not be in its final form past the deadline and will not be officially released or distributed, even if I do raise the $10,000 needed to do the publishing. 

Then, there is the possibility that my printer could go down and this would mean that I will have to change to third-party printing services (Home Depot) to complete the final form of my autobiography. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to the campaign because money is tight or if you are on a fixed income, then you can still announce this campaign by mainly doing this the “word-of mouth” way---it is a marketing technique that is free. 

You can use the Indiegogo share tools that the Indiegogo website provides to help me in my campaign.

story:
We are a loving group of poets and translators who have started “I and You” - a love poetry project on Facebook. 

The love between two people is universal. Love is something we all can feel and it makes each one of us feel special. In the world today, "Us and Them" is the problem, "I and You" is the solution. A love poem can speak to everyone, it is only the language that keep us apart.  

Check out our page here 

That's why we write and translate poems in English, Arabic, Hebrew and French. The response is incredible. An ad on Facebook for only a few dollars reaches very far. Our mission is to reach all people, everywhere, in all languages.

A Valentine to the World: Help raise a thousand dollars for our project to share love poetry with two million people around the world. A hundred thousand will engage by liking, commenting or sharing. (The numbers are based on our statistics so far. Marketers will be envious.)

Here is an example of what we do:

חכה לי שם Wait for me there هناك انتظرني (by Haneen Al Sayegh)

Wait for me there
Where clouds fall
To the sky
There, where the sea
Climbs to the springs
Where the trees grow into seeds
Wait for me...
Kiss me there
At the junction of logic and reason
Follow my trace
Over the paths of the impossible
Where our lives grow into youth
Wait for me


We belong there
Away from the disappointment of reality
There's no place for us here
In the land of the Familiar and the sleepers
A land that blesses
The orphancy of the embryos in the wombs
No place for us on the land that resurrects the pulse of death in the veins of the living
And extinguishes the last buds of life
In the veins of dead
No place for us , on a land
That condemns a cotton wound
Blesses a butcher's kiss
And any suicidal project
I'll wait for you away
One evening
Naked from all my fears
Relaxed dreamy
Laying on a piece of sky


هناك انتظرني
عند تساقط الغيوم
إلى السماء
هناك حيث يصعد البحر
نحو الجداول
حيث تنمو الاشجار إلى بذور
انتظرني،
هناك قبلني
عند مفترق المنطق و العقل
اقتفي أثري
فوق ممرات المستحيل
هناك حيث تنحدر أعمارنا
نحو الشباب
انتظرني

مكاننا هناك
بعيداً عن خذلان الواقع
لا مكان لنا
في أرض المألوف و النيام
أرض تبارك
يتم الأجنة في الأرحام
لا مكان لنا على أرض
تبعث نبض الموت
في عروق الاحياء
و تطفئ آخر براعم الحياة
في أوردة الاموات
لا مكان لنا على أرض
تدين جرح القطن
تبارك قبلة جزار
وكل مشروع انتحار
بعيداً سأنتظرك
ذات مساء
عارية من كل مخاوفي
مسترخية حالمة
راقدة فوق قطعة سماء


חכה לי שם
היכן שהעננים נופלים
לשמיים
שם, היכן שהים
מטפס למעיינות
היכן שהעצים גדלים להיות זרעים
חכה לי...
נשק אותי שם
בצומת ההגיון והסיבות
עקוב אחרי השובל שלי
בשבילי הבלתי אפשרי
היכן שחיינו גדלים לנעורים
חכה לי

אנחנו שייכים לשם
הרחק מהאכזבה של
המציאות
אין לנו מקום כאן
בארץ של המוכר ושל הנמים
ארץ אשר מברכת
את היתמות של העוברים בתוך רחמם
אין לנו מקום בארץ הזאת שמחייה את דופק המתים בתוך ורידי החיים
ומכבה את שאריות בדלי החיים בתוך ורידי המתים
אין לנו מקום בארץ
שמגנה פציעות כותנה
מברכת נשיקותיו של הקצב
וכל מבצע התאבדות
אחכה לך הרחק
ערב אחד
ערומה מכל פחדיי
רגועה חולמנית
נחה על חתיכת שמיים

story:
What's it all About

I lost my hearing when I was 27 years old.  I spent 5 years in hell.  It was one of the lowest points of my life.  I never had any guidance to help me understand the changes I needed to make to thrive in a deafie life. That was 16 years ago but I finally got it right.  Life is great now. I want to share what I have learned to help others adjust and thrive with late onset deafness.  Here is something to think about.

Late on-set hearing loss is a rampant disability that lives on the fringes of society.  It is not a cause that is championed in mainstream America.  People who suffer from a hearing loss suffer in their own silence.  They deny their own  communication needs to stay assimilated in hearing society due to negative views on deafness.  This type of action leads to isolation.

According to The National Institute on Deafness and Other Communication Disorders (NIDCD) approximately 17 percent (36 million) of American adults report some degree of hearing loss. Three out of every thousand children in the United States are born deaf or hard-of-hearing.  Over 4 million children are born each year that equates to over 12,300 children born with some form of hearing loss per year.  And yet when was the last time you saw a news segment about hearing loss or saw an article about a new book to help new deafies?

That is why I wrote "A Survival Guide for New Deafies!" To help people cope and deal with late onset deafness.  What hearing, newly deafened and newly hard of hearing people don't understand is losing your hearing affects EVERY aspect of how one lives their life.  Not making changes can cause a calamity of issues.  I'm not trying to sound all doom and gloom but New Deafies need new life skills or things are going to be tough for a very long time.  The cool thing is this little book is a very fast read, full of humor and anecdotes that can immediately make a positive difference in a new deafies life. The book is specifically designed to be able to be read out of sequence making it an easy reference source. 

How I've gotten to this point

I wrote the book and used my savings to form a vanity press (Deaf Girl Publishing) to publish the book in June of 2011.   I have successfully used social media, guest speaking and book signings to "spread the word" to reach people who will benefit from the book.  The response has been great.  But my reach has been limited.  There are literally millions of people in the United States and abroad whose lives can be empowered and uplifted by this book.  I want to reach as many of them as I can, to help make a bad situation better.  So that people don't have to hide or suffer in silence anymore.


Current Projects

I  will be using my Indiegogo funds to cover the cost of a book tour and app development.

The developing app will help deaf and hard of hearing people demonstrate the significance of their hearing loss to family, friends and co-workers.  This will help them better understand and appreciate how difficult it is for the deaf or hard of hearing person.  This app will compliment the book but sold separately.   The goal is to help new deafies and new hard of hearing people move from the fringes of society. 

Future Projects

  • Second Edition
  • Second Ed. Book Tour
  • Translation (I have been amazed by the interest in my book from non-English speaking countries.)

And Lastly

This is a labor of love for me, it is very near and dear to my heart because I have been forced to live with deafness.   And win, lose, or draw with this crowdfunding effort I am committed to getting my book out there.   I am only asking for your support so I can take my efforts to the next level and make an even bigger difference on a grander scale to reach the people who can benefit from the book.  Thank you for considering backing me.  For more info: http://DeafGirlAmy.com

I wrote the book and used my savings to form a vanity press (Deaf Girl Publishing) to publish the book in June of 2011.   I have successfully used social media, guest speaking and book signings to "spread the word" to reach people who will benefit from the book.  The response has been great.  But my reach has been limited.  There are literally millions of people in the United States and abroad whose lives can be empowered and uplifted by this book.  I want to reach as many of them as I can, to help make a bad situation better.  So that people don't have to hide or suffer in silence anymore.
 Current Projects
I  will be using my Indiegogo funds to cover the cost of a book tour and app development.
The developing app will help deaf and hard of hearing people demonstrate the significance of their hearing loss to family, friends and co-workers.  This will help them better understand and appreciate how difficult it is for the deaf or hard of hearing person.  This app will compliment the book but sold separately.   The goal is to help new deafies and new hard of hearing people move from the fringes of society. 
Future Projects

Second Edition
Second Ed. Book Tour
Translation (I have been amazed by the interest in my book from non-English speaking countries.)
And Lastly
This is a labor of love for me, it is very near and dear to my heart because I have been forced to live with deafness.   And win, lose, or draw with this crowdfunding effort I am committed to getting my book out there.   I am only asking for your support so I can take my efforts to the next level and make an even bigger difference on a grander scale to reach the people who can benefit from the book.  Thank you for considering backing me.  For more info: http://DeafGirlAmy.com

story:
Short Summary

Africa Book Club is a personal project that I began in 2010 as a way to share my interest in African literature. Since then, Africa Book Club has grown to become the go-to place for book lovers looking to explore interesting fiction and non-fiction from Africa. Through our website (www.africabookclub.com), two active communities on Facebook and Twitter, and an award winning monthly e-newsletter, Africa Book Club features books and short stories, author profiles and interviews, and monthly book giveaway competitions. 

In August 2013, Africa Book Club launched Africa Book Club Short Reads, a monthly writing competition for short stories that are either set in Africa or written by African authors. Building on this success and with your support, we would like to launch the Africa Book Club Anthology of African Stories, which will be a collection of winning entries selected from the competition. We plan to produce two anthologies a year, with the first short story collection scheduled to be released in 2014. 

Why We Need Your Support

While we are able to take care of the day-to-day running of the Africa Book Club site, sustaining the monthly short story competition and producing an anthology will require more funds than our small operation can muster. That’s where you come in, dear friends. 

Your money will go into the production of our first anthology, including the cover design, interior layout, proof-reading, e-book formatting and offset printing. We hope to sell enough copies of the first edition to be able to keep the project going. 

The Impact

Reading matters. It can be a window through which people learn about different cultures. 

Our aim is to produce an anthology that speaks to the diversity of Africa. To that end, we are targeting a mix of stories and themes that run the breadth of the continent. The Africa Book Club Short Reads competition provides an excellent platform to collect these stories. We have pulled together 38 stories and we will be adding many more each month. 

These stories, most of them written by as-yet unpublished writers, span many countries and cover wide-ranging themes. They reflect a continent on the move, one that is bustling with life, creativity, poverty, love, opportunity, hope, and promise - a far cry from the negative stereotypes that many have come to associate with Africa. 

Stretch Goals

  • If we raise $7,500, the extra money will go towards increasing the prize money for our monthly Africa Book Club Short Reads competition. 
  • If we raise $12,500, we will scale up our school library donation program, through which we provide books by African authors to school and college libraries in Africa. Every additional $500 raised, converts to a gift hamper of 20-30 books to a school or college library in Africa. 

What You Get

We’ve put together an exciting package of rewards for this project, including copies of the upcoming Africa Book Club Anthology of African Stories, which we plan to release in early 2014. 

In addition to copies of the anthology, we will be giving away a selection of award-winning books by African authors, including three titles that have previously won the Man Booker prize and works by four African authors, who have received the Nobel Prize in Literature. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Remember, if you can't help with a contribution, you can help immensely by sharing this campaign with your social networks, friends, colleagues, family and everyone. Every bit helps us reach our goals.

Be a part of this effort to change the narrative on Africa. Help fund our campaign.

story:
The Synopsis

What if your tattoos were not they seemed? What if, the design on your body held
more than just ink? Inmate and former priest, Nick Stanton is about to find out.

Imprisoned for a crime he committed, while trying to cover-up the crime of senior member of the clergy, Nick struggles to adapt to his new life. After
countless failed attempts to blend in, he is sent an invitation by a prison
tattoo artist, simply known as The Tattoo Man.

That meeting and subsequent tattoos will change Nick's life forever. Using ash
from dead prisoners, The Tattoo Man traps the souls of the dead and imprisons
them in the bodies of the living. This duality of spirits allows him to sow
chaos throughout the prison and if the prisoners are released, throughout the
civilized world. In Nick, he sees something else. Something special, something he’s waited decades for. A way to escape.


 

Introductions

My name is Scott. I’m a lover of tattoos and the supernatural. As a young lad, I would listen in rapt awe for hours to my Grandfather spin yarns of the eerie and supernatural. As an adult, I've always been an avid storyteller, entertaining friends and family with imagined world, tales of epic adventure and of course scaring with wicked imagined of the supernatural. I've been writing many of  these tantalizing morsels for years, but mostly for myself. I never seriously thought about publishing anything, until a chance encounter a number of years back. After hearing about my story ideas and reading some of the passages this person encouraged me to get them out for others to enjoy. “A unique outlook.  A fresh perspective”, were the words phrases used.

I’ve worked in the Film and TV Industry for many years and having worked on a few feature films and the like, since the many rehash of the standard supernatural story. Whether it be Vampires, Ghosts, Zombies and it got me to thinking about my early short stories which “Inked” is based on.

So I thought “Why not see if others had the same interest as me”, and here I am.

 

CAMPAIGN

What I hope to achieve are three things.

1)  Finish writing and self publish the book Inked.

2)  At the same time or shortly after, write a screenplay for the movie.

3)  Raise the money and with my contacts in the local film industry, create a film to show at independent film festivals (such as Atlantic Film Festival, Toronto Film
Festival, Sundance, etc.) to raise enough awareness and more funds to produce a
feature film.

I plan on doing this in Three Phases. This is present campaign is to accomplish goal One and Two. If they are successful, I plan to do a second campaign in Spring 2014.

Yes. These are ambitious goals. I feel so strongly about this project and so many
others who have read what I have written so far feel the same, that I want to
take that chance. Nothing ventured, nothing gained. 


 

How You As a Contributor Fit In

Foremost, contributions. That’s why I’m here looking to raise funds and hopefully that’s why you’re here to help.

To that end, I'm giving any other budding writer a chance to have one of their characters or ideas or themselves part of my world. To see it brought to life in print and possibly the silver screen, simply by choosing the perk that suits their desire and contribution.

My ideal situation would be to raise enough money, to continue writing during the coming months. The film / television production season locally is in it’s slow period and while it’s an ideal time to write, I still need to do pesky things like eat, pay bills, etc. You know how it goes. I’ve been writing a lot lately, but it’s not easy while looking for work. Stress is a killer to creativity. Anyone who has done anything creative knows what I mean. Part of the money raised while go to alleviating that stress and allow me to finish the book in months, instead of years. My expectation, if all goes well, would be to be ready to publish in Spring 2014. 

Along with living expenses, there is the cost of publishing, printing, marketing, advertising. It all adds up for one guy to do, but I’m willing to do as much as I can on my own. I believe that much in this story.

Secondly, pass the word around. Even if you can’t contribute monetarily, I ask the least you do is share the link. Let others know. The more who visit here, the better
my chances of making this a reality and giving people a great story to read.
Hopefully more.

I know I’ve been vague as to the meat of the story. Well, I did that so you’ll want
to read the book. *wink*.  Seriously though, the story is about body invading spirits, good verses evils, turmoil with inner demons (both figuratively and literally), trust, rekindled friendships and lost loves. It's a horror story with a unique perspective. To use a phrase. 

 

Where Does the Money Go

Great question. Here is a break down of the expenditures for this phase of the project.

Developmental Editing - $4000

Copyediting - $3200

Cover Design - $2000

Formatting for Print and Digital - $1500

Getting an ISDN - $100

Pre-Publication Review - $400

Marketing and PR - $3600 ($600 / month for 6 months once book is published)

Living expenses for 8 months - $10,000 ($1250 / month)

There you have it. What I am going to be doing with your contributions. Anything over the amount raised, will go to the next phase. Which is to make this into a short film to show at film festivals and raise interest for a future film.

Benefactor and Patron Perks

The follow artists have graciously lent their talent to my project in the form of a custom piece of art work for the above two Perks.

If you are a Benefactor, you can choose one these three artists to work with you on a custom piece of artwork. There is no limitation. If you can imagine it, they can create it for you. If you prefer to be reward with one of their already beautiful masterpieces, that can be arranged as well.   

If you decide to be a Patron, each one of these creative individuals will bring to life a separate incarnation of your dreams, or nightmares. If you choose this perk and wish to have one of the tantalizing creations already on display, arrangements will be made.

So take a gander and see what could be yours.

JARED - http://j3concepts.prosite.com/517/gallery

JAMES - http://jamesneish.com/

JP - http://www.jpcustomairbrush.ca/

 

The Impact

To me, the biggest impact of not meeting my goals will be the delay of this
project. It'll take a lot longer to complete if I can't support myself, while trying to write and self publish this project. Plain and simple. 

To you, the biggest impact will be not helping me reach those goals in a timely
fashion. That's it really. No guilt, no pressure. We all have things going on in our lives. All I'm looking to do is use the internet for the tool it was designed. To reach out to like minded people to share ideas and hopefully lend support. 


 

Lastly

If you can’t at this time contribute, that’s cool. I understand. Everyone has their own
dreams and aspirations. What I’m asking for is a chance and a helping hand with
mine.

So at the very least, I ask that you spread the word. Post the link to this project on blogs, sites, journals, Facebook. Anything to get the word out and generate interest. Just doing that would be a tremendous help and garnish my eternal gratitude.

Thank you and Stay True

story:
(el proyecto está explicado en español más abajo)   

                   

The Other River: “It is a book not to be missed, a book to devour, which makes us want to grab a backpack, or to simply look at the world on the other side of the window with different eyes. Discover a couple, an adventure, a unique perspective of the world.” Lea Nasca, 2014.         

               

                               

                                                  Hello, we are Anna and Diego.

Anna is a writter and photographer, she has been taking photographs all around the globe. Diego is an ex-banker, and has been drawing for many years. 

After eight years traveling around the world on a tandem bike, we are now raising funds for publishing our first book. Within it, we share stories of our experience, illustrated with drawings and photographs

This book is a bridge between YOU and US. Open your doors to a new world, which will seduce you and broaden your horizons.

We hope you may be part of this story! All donations are welcome! Donations of 12 US$ and above will be rewarded with presents. USD 25 or more will also see their NAME WRITTEN ON THE FIRST EDITION OF THE BOOK! Please have a look at the gift alternatives on the right frame of this page.

Join us in this project, help us share a vision of the world with everyone!

                  
   Here we explain the details of the project, thank you for reading. You can also watch the video on the bottom of this page. 

About us

Diego and Anna two untiring travelers. Eight years of challenges, love and fantasy.

We met eight years ago, and soon thereafter left everything: Diego his life as a banker, Anna her cinematography studies. We thought to travel for one year and then return to our sedentary life, but we soon adopted a nomadic life, to discover the world in which we live, their people and ourselves. Passionate dreamers, we make the reality a way of life with love and fantasy. Now with two children born on the trip, we will soon jump back onto our tandem bike (a bicycle for two) and, all together, continue onwards to new horizons.  

Our page, www.xurruruca.com         

We work and share our art work in art festival, meetings, and on the street.

You may see our work at www.xurruruca.com/galerias.php                        

             


The Book 

The Other River is written by Anna, and it is illustrated by Diego's drawings and Anna's photographs. Our major project is to build a strong bridge between us and others, to share years of experiences, of living and feeling, as well as our view of the world that surrounds us. Eight years ago Anna began to take notes and Diego to make sketches, and for the last two years they have be shaping what is now the book.

   

Anna has loved literature since young. She has written poetry, short stories and scripts for short films. Meanwhile Diego has always been attracted to drawing and painting, and his work has been widely exhibited around the world.


Other Reviews

                  

While time vanished for our travelers along the road, the hours escape from the reader upon opening the book.... Gradually, you will allow yourself to be carried into Anna´s world, and you will meet different men and women and discover a path full of contradictions and nuances. The author reveals not only paintings of the outside world, but also a sincere encounter, sometimes hard, sometimes pleasant, with herself and with the essence of travel and life. Gustavo Peña, 2014.

“Diego´s drawings always leave me suspended. In them, I find stories and images which at first I had not noticed. I like them. They seem a dream or a vision. I was captivated by a feeling of immense loneliness.” Lin Zhen, 2014.

The team

Anna Caranta traveler, photographer, writter.  https://www.facebook.com/anna.diego.73  http://www.xurruruca.com/quienessomos.php

Diego Martinez, traveler, illustrator, painter.   https://www.facebook.com/XuRRuRuca http://www.xurruruca.com/quienessomos.php

Diego Bennet, well-known designer from Argentina,  https://www.facebook.com/creactivodiseno?pnref=story


 Pawel Maiszczak, polish graphic artist who received several awards. http://www.mmsilesia.pl/243874/wojciech-grzyb-m...

Silvina Garcia Guevarra, editor.

 Susan Leaman, Literature translator.

http://www.proz.com/profile/770437


Coloborate with the book: 


Jorge Conesa, photographer and reporter,  https://elanguloquefaltaba.wordpress.com/

Julio Premat, professor of Latin American literature in the University of Paris and one of the most prominent argentinean critic. https://www.fce.com.ar/ar/autores/autor_detalle.aspx?idAutor=2457

Lea Nasca, antropologist, linguist and singer. 


What are we looking for, and what we offer

The cost for having the book finished and printed in a first edition of 2,000 books in two languages (1,000 each) is as follows:                                                                                                                                     

·US$1,500. Is the cost of the design of the book, including corrections. This will be done by Diego Bennet, a well-known Argentinian designer, with the contribution of Pawel Maliszczak, an experimented Polish designer.

·US$ 13,534. Is the cost of a first printing in two languages, including the cost of the translation from Spanish to English. 

Total amount is U$ 15.034

In addition we also have costs associated with marketing and promotion, issuing the ISBN, and copyright deposit; we will tackle those ourselves.

Your contribution shall be rewarded, and you will receive original and exclusive gifts (as shown on the right hand side of the page), beyond the satisfaction of having contributed to this project, and especially our deepest thanks and appreciation. 

Everyone who participate will be posted in our website as co-founder!!!!!
http://www.xurruruca.com/en/theotherriver.php


Please note that in case we do not reach the campaign’s funding goal, you will get your presents anyway. 

Many people worldwide have participated in our adventure. We mentioned some in this link: Hands On The Way (www.xurruruca.com)  Join them!

How many possibilities are there to see this project done?

Absolutely all. We know the risks of publishing a book are high. We also know, at the same time, that our story is special. The book is already written and edited, ready to be published. The illustrations are already made. We have the translator, the designer, and a printing press. And of course, we thought, if we have been able to overcome all obstacles to create a nomadic family and live this life style, we can fulfill this new project!

Other ways you can help

•You can spread it through your social networks and e-mail. Make our project known to as many people as possible!
• You can use Indiegogo´s tools to share this.
• If you have another proposal (distribution, translation into another language, print, notes in the press or in your website, or anything you can think), please write to xurruruca@gmail.com, your ideas are very welcome!


***************************** español*******************************

                                    

" Un libro imperdible, que se devora, que nos da ganas de agarrar una mochila, o simplemente de mirar el mundo que tenemos del otro lado de la ventana, con otros ojos. Descubran una pareja, una aventura, un punto de vista único sobre el mundo." Lea Nasca, 2014. 

          

                                                   Hola, somos Anna y Diego. 

Anna es fotógrafa, trabajó con sus fotografías en todo el mundo. Diego es un ex-economista, que trabaja con sus dibujos desde hace años. Sus trabajos también han sido expuestos y vendidos en muchos lugares. 

Después de ocho años de viaje por el mundo en una bicicleta doble, estamos recaudando fondos para publicar nuestro primer libro. Con este, compartimos relatos de nuestra experiencia, ilustrados con dibujos y fotografías. 

Este libro es un puente entre TÚ y NOSOTROS. Abrí tus puertas a un nuevo mundo, que sin duda te seducirá y ampliará tus propios caminos. 

Esperamos que seas parte de esta historia! Toda donacion es bienvenida! Y a partir de los 12 U$ te hacemos regalos. A partir de 25 U$ tu nombre aparecerá en la primera edición impresa del libro!! Puedes mirar lo que deseas recibir en la parte derecha de esta página. 

Sé parte de este proyecto, y ayudanos a compartir una visión del mundo con todos! 

              

Aqui explicamos el proyecto en detalle, gracias por leer. También puedes mirar el video en el top de la página.

Nosotros.

Diego y Anna, dos viajeros incansables. Ocho años de desafíos, de amor y de fantasías.

Nos conocimos hace ocho años y poco tiempo después dejamos todo: Diego su vida de banquero, Anna sus estudios de cinematografía. Pensábamos viajar un año y volver a la vida sedentaria, pero pronto adoptamos una vida nómada y libre, para descubrir el mundo en el que vivimos, sus habitantes, y a nosotros mismos. Apasionados y soñadores, hacemos que la realidad sea una herramienta para vivir de amor y fantasías. Ahora con dos hijos nacidos en el viaje, pensamos pronto retomar nuestro tándem (una bicicleta doble), y de a cuatro seguir hacia nuevos horizontes.

Nuestra página, www.xurruruca.com


Trabajamos y compartimos nuestros trabajos artísticos en festivales, conferencias, y en la calle.

Pueden ver algo de nuestro trabajo en www.xurruruca.com/galerias.php

                   

El libro 

La novela El Otro Río,  está escrita por Anna e ilustrada con dibujos de Diego y fotografías de Anna.  Nuestro gran proyecto es armar un puente sólido entre nosotros y ustedes, para compartir años de experiencias, de vivir y sentir, de viajar, asi como nuestra mirada sobre el mundo que nos rodea. 

       

Críticas. 

“Si el tiempo para nuestros dos viajeros se deshizo sobre el camino, las horas se le escapan al lector al abrir el libro... De a poco, uno se deja llevar y envolver por el mundo que Anna descubre, se encuentra con hombres y mujeres muy distintos y un camino lleno de contradicciones y matices. La autora  revela no solamente pinturas del mundo exterior, sino de un encuentro sincero, a veces difícil a veces placentero, con ella misma y con la esencia del viaje y de la vida”, Gustavo Peña, 2014.

“Los dibujos de Diego siempre me dejan suspendido.  En ellos encuentro historias y se revelan imágenes que a primera vista no había percibido. Me gustan. Parecen un sueño, o una visión. Siempre al mirarlos me embarga una sensación de inmensa soledad”, Lin Zhen, 2014.

El equipo

Anna Caranta viajera, fotógrafa y escritora.  https://www.facebook.com/anna.diego.73http://www.xurruruca.com/quienessomos.php

Diego Martinez, viajero, ilustrador y pintor.  https://www.facebook.com/XuRRuRucahttp://www.xurruruca.com/quienessomos.php

Diego Bennet, reconocido diseñador gráfico de Argentina,  https://www.facebook.com/creactivodiseno?pnref=story

 Pawel Maiszczak, artista gráfico polaco que recibió varios premios.http://www.mmsilesia.pl/243874/wojciech-grzyb-m...

Silvina Garcia Guevarra, editor.

 Susan Leaman, Traductora .

http://www.proz.com/profile/770437


Colaboran con el libro: 


Jorge Conesa, fotógrafo y reportero,  https://elanguloquefaltaba.wordpress.com/

Julio Premat, profesor de literatura hispanoamericana en la Universidad de Paris VIII, y uno de los más importantes criticos argentinos. https://www.fce.com.ar/ar/autores/autor_detalle.aspx?idAutor=2457

Lea Nasca, antrópologa, lingüista y cantora. 


Qué buscamos, y qué ofrecemos.

                 

El costo para tener el libro terminado e impreso en una primera edición de 2.000 libros en dos idiomas ( 1000 en cada en idioma) es el siguiente: 

  • 1.500 U$. Es el costo para el diseño del libro, incluyendo correcciones. Este trabajo será realizado por Diego Bennet, reconocido diseñador Argentino, con la participación de Pawel Maliszczak, experimentado diseñador polaco. 
  • 13. 534 U$. Es el costo de una primera impresión en dos idiomas, incluye el precio de la traducción del español al inglés.   
Es un total de 15.034 U$.  
A esto hay que sumarle los costos de la promoción del libro, la emisión del ISBN y el depósito del derecho de autor, que enfrentaremos nosotros.
Tu aporte está retribuido, y recibirás en tu casa regalos originales y exclusivos (los puedes ver más arriba en el margen derecho de la página), además de la satisfacción de haber contribuido en este proyecto, y sobre todo nuestro más profundo agradecimiento y reconocimiento. 
Todos los que participen del proyecto serán nombrados especialmente como co-fundadores del libro!!!! 
http://www.xurruruca.com/Elotrorio.php

Por favor tené en cuenta que en caso que no lleguemos a alcanzar el monto total de la campaña, recibirás igualmente tu regalo.
PARA LOS ARGENTINOS PROPONEMOS FACILIDADES DE PAGO> PUEDEN MIRAR EN ACTUALIZACIONES

Ya han participitado en nuestra aventura personas del mundo entero. Mencionamos algunas en este link, Las Manos por el Camino (www.xurruruca.com)   Únete a ellas!

Cuántas probabilidades hay de ver este proyecto llevado a cabo?

Absolutamente todas. Sabemos que los riesgos al publicar un libro son altos. También sabemos que nuestra historia es especial. El libro ya está escrito, listo para ser publicado. Las ilustraciones ya están hechas. Ya está la traductora sobre el texto,el diseñador, y una imprenta. Y claro, pensamos, si hemos podido sobrepasar todos los obstáculo para poder crear una familia nómada y vivir con este estilo de vida, hemos de poder llevar a cabo este nuevo proyecto! 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

  • puedes difundirlo por tus redes sociales, por email. Haz conocer nuestro proyecto a la mayor cantidad de gente posible! 
  • Puedes usar las herramientas para compartir de este sitio indiegogo. 
  • Si tienes otra propuesta ( ayuda en la distribución, traducción a otro idioma, impresiones, notas en la prensa o en tu página web, o todo lo que se te ocurra), escribinos a xurruruca@gmail.com, tus ideas son bienvenidas!

story_txt:
(el proyecto está explicado en español más abajo)   


                   
The Other River: “It is a book not to be missed, a book to devour, which makes us want to grab a backpack, or to simply look at the world on the other side of the window with different eyes. Discover a couple, an adventure, a unique perspective of the world.” Lea Nasca, 2014.         


               



                               
                                                  Hello, we are Anna and Diego.Anna is a writter and photographer, she has been taking photographs all around the globe. Diego is an ex-banker, and has been drawing for many years. 
After eight years traveling around the world on a tandem bike, we are now raising funds for publishing our first book. Within it, we share stories of our experience, illustrated with drawings and photographsThis book is a bridge between YOU and US. Open your doors to a new world, which will seduce you and broaden your horizons.We hope you may be part of this story! All donations are welcome! Donations of 12 US$ and above will be rewarded with presents. USD 25 or more will also see their NAME WRITTEN ON THE FIRST EDITION OF THE BOOK! Please have a look at the gift alternatives on the right frame of this page.Join us in this project, help us share a vision of the world with everyone!                     Here we explain the details of the project, thank you for reading. You can also watch the video on the bottom of this page. 
About us

Diego and Anna two untiring travelers. Eight years of challenges, love and fantasy.




We met eight years ago, and soon thereafter left everything: Diego his life as a banker, Anna her cinematography studies. We thought to travel for one year and then return to our sedentary life, but we soon adopted a nomadic life, to discover the world in which we live, their people and ourselves. Passionate dreamers, we make the reality a way of life with love and fantasy. Now with two children born on the trip, we will soon jump back onto our tandem bike (a bicycle for two) and, all together, continue onwards to new horizons.  
Our page, www.xurruruca.com         

We work and share our art work in art festival, meetings, and on the street.
You may see our work at www.xurruruca.com/galerias.php                        


             







The Book 
The Other River is written by Anna, and it is illustrated by Diego's drawings and Anna's photographs. Our major project is to build a strong bridge between us and others, to share years of experiences, of living and feeling, as well as our view of the world that surrounds us. Eight years ago Anna began to take notes and Diego to make sketches, and for the last two years they have be shaping what is now the book.
   
Anna has loved literature since young. She has written poetry, short stories and scripts for short films. Meanwhile Diego has always been attracted to drawing and painting, and his work has been widely exhibited around the world.

Other Reviews                  
While time vanished for our travelers along the road, the hours escape from the reader upon opening the book.... Gradually, you will allow yourself to be carried into Anna´s world, and you will meet different men and women and discover a path full of contradictions and nuances. The author reveals not only paintings of the outside world, but also a sincere encounter, sometimes hard, sometimes pleasant, with herself and with the essence of travel and life. Gustavo Peña, 2014.
“Diego´s drawings always leave me suspended. In them, I find stories and images which at first I had not noticed. I like them. They seem a dream or a vision. I was captivated by a feeling of immense loneliness.” Lin Zhen, 2014.
The team
Anna Caranta traveler, photographer, writter.  https://www.facebook.com/anna.diego.73  http://www.xurruruca.com/quienessomos.php


Diego Martinez, traveler, illustrator, painter.   https://www.facebook.com/XuRRuRuca http://www.xurruruca.com/quienessomos.php


Diego Bennet, well-known designer from Argentina,  https://www.facebook.com/creactivodiseno?pnref=story


 Pawel Maiszczak, polish graphic artist who received several awards. http://www.mmsilesia.pl/243874/wojciech-grzyb-m...
Silvina Garcia Guevarra, editor.
 Susan Leaman, Literature translator.

http://www.proz.com/profile/770437


Coloborate with the book: 
Jorge Conesa, photographer and reporter,  https://elanguloquefaltaba.wordpress.com/
Julio Premat, professor of Latin American literature in the University of Paris and one of the most prominent argentinean critic. https://www.fce.com.ar/ar/autores/autor_detalle.aspx?idAutor=2457
Lea Nasca, antropologist, linguist and singer. 

What are we looking for, and what we offer

The cost for having the book finished and printed in a first edition of 2,000 books in two languages (1,000 each) is as follows:                                                                                                                                     

·US$1,500. Is the cost of the design of the book, including corrections. This will be done by Diego Bennet, a well-known Argentinian designer, with the contribution of Pawel Maliszczak, an experimented Polish designer.
·US$ 13,534. Is the cost of a first printing in two languages, including the cost of the translation from Spanish to English. 
Total amount is U$ 15.034


In addition we also have costs associated with marketing and promotion, issuing the ISBN, and copyright deposit; we will tackle those ourselves.
Your contribution shall be rewarded, and you will receive original and exclusive gifts (as shown on the right hand side of the page), beyond the satisfaction of having contributed to this project, and especially our deepest thanks and appreciation. 
Everyone who participate will be posted in our website as co-founder!!!!!http://www.xurruruca.com/en/theotherriver.php
Please note that in case we do not reach the campaign’s funding goal, you will get your presents anyway. 





Many people worldwide have participated in our adventure. We mentioned some in this link: Hands On The Way (www.xurruruca.com)  Join them!
How many possibilities are there to see this project done?
Absolutely all. We know the risks of publishing a book are high. We also know, at the same time, that our story is special. The book is already written and edited, ready to be published. The illustrations are already made. We have the translator, the designer, and a printing press. And of course, we thought, if we have been able to overcome all obstacles to create a nomadic family and live this life style, we can fulfill this new project!
Other ways you can help
•You can spread it through your social networks and e-mail. Make our project known to as many people as possible!• You can use Indiegogo´s tools to share this.• If you have another proposal (distribution, translation into another language, print, notes in the press or in your website, or anything you can think), please write to xurruruca@gmail.com, your ideas are very welcome!
***************************** español*******************************


                                    
" Un libro imperdible, que se devora, que nos da ganas de agarrar una mochila, o simplemente de mirar el mundo que tenemos del otro lado de la ventana, con otros ojos. Descubran una pareja, una aventura, un punto de vista único sobre el mundo." Lea Nasca, 2014. 


          
                                                   Hola, somos Anna y Diego. 
Anna es fotógrafa, trabajó con sus fotografías en todo el mundo. Diego es un ex-economista, que trabaja con sus dibujos desde hace años. Sus trabajos también han sido expuestos y vendidos en muchos lugares. 
Después de ocho años de viaje por el mundo en una bicicleta doble, estamos recaudando fondos para publicar nuestro primer libro. Con este, compartimos relatos de nuestra experiencia, ilustrados con dibujos y fotografías. 
Este libro es un puente entre TÚ y NOSOTROS. Abrí tus puertas a un nuevo mundo, que sin duda te seducirá y ampliará tus propios caminos. 
Esperamos que seas parte de esta historia! Toda donacion es bienvenida! Y a partir de los 12 U$ te hacemos regalos. A partir de 25 U$ tu nombre aparecerá en la primera edición impresa del libro!! Puedes mirar lo que deseas recibir en la parte derecha de esta página. 
Sé parte de este proyecto, y ayudanos a compartir una visión del mundo con todos! 
              


Aqui explicamos el proyecto en detalle, gracias por leer. También puedes mirar el video en el top de la página.
