story:
Story of My Book

IoT 2030

This is a book about the future potential of IoT devices and how they can revolutionize our lives and industry.

My name is Chong Hwan Kim and I am the author of IoT 2030. I wrote this book because IoT is coming to our living room, our cities, our jobs and basic needs in life so I wanted to offer a glimpse of what the future is like.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the IoT industry and how its shaping the world. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for Technology in you. And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you see the future and how it will change your life.

In this book, you'll learn about Technology and Innovation and how it can be used in the future:

  1. New technology business
  2. What all the buzz is about for IoT related businesses
  3. How technology can affect our lives

Based on my research/interviewing/experiences/guesses, this book also explains how:

  1. IoT will bring the next industrial revolution
  2. How the change will come at a lightning speed
  3. Such lifestyle change will bring profits on an unimaginable scale


You will love this book if you are an average person who is interested in trends in the upcoming future.

IoT 2030 is a non-fiction book that speaks to tech-friendly and entrepreneurial go-getters who are looking at what's next and how it impacts our lives for the first time.

 

The Book - [IoT 2030]

The book is written in six parts after the introduction, and it touches the core aspect of how the Internet of Things will change and improve our lives for the better as well as touching on social issues like cybersecurity that is growing at the alarming rate with the current geopolitical issues that is happening around us.


Part 1 → Smart home

  • Turning your appliance as an information hub
  • Devices of the future for your home
  • Countless Applications

 


Part 2 →5G and IoT/ is it platform or content that drives IoT proliferation?

  • What we need for it to happen. What comes first?
  • Public and Private: Smart city
  • The Technology Miracle
  • Providing infrastructure for future generation?

 

Part 3 →MEDTECH

  • Virtual doctors
  • Finding a Doctor that fits
  • Knowing your medicine
  • The issue with medical devices

 

Part 4 →Connectivity and manufacturing

  • Introduction of Smart Manufacturing
  • From high technology requirement to high flexibility requirement
  • Past instances of using data for operational efficiency
  • The need for smart manufacturing
  • Private and Public Sector
  • It's manufacturing that brings growth

 

Part 5 →From simple past to a complex future

  • Fast fashion and proof of the need for nimbleness
  • The Zara's of the future: smaller but more powerful
  • The adaptive mindset
  • Legacy technology and speed
  • Delivering food on time
  • Flexibility

 

Part 6 →Cybersecurity

  • Cybersecurity as a serious issue
  • The implementation of new network and privacy.
  • State entity and Private companies
  • Cheaper connectivity and the need for security companies

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in October 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this October 2019.
  • When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book
    (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

 

About the Author

CREDIBILITY: Chong Hwan Kim is working at Samsung who is also currently pursuing his full-time MBA at Georgetown, He has lived in 6 different countries (Norway, India, Indonesia, Swiss, US, South Korea) for 20 years and has a comprehensive understanding of different cultures and markets around the world. Chong is also considered highly credible as a sales/marketing expert in the electronic component industry at Georgetown University McDonough School of Business.

Chong Hwan Kim is very curious about the future of the information technology and how the future will be paved out before the general norm is aware of the changes

Outside this book, Chong Hwan Kim loves talking and reading about different cultures and the social issues that are prevalent today.

For more information, you can connect with Chong at ck952@georgetown.edu

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #IoT2030 and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all your love and support!

Thanks again,
Chong Hwan Kim

In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for Technology in you. And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you see the future and how it will change your life.In this book, you'll learn about Technology and Innovation and how it can be used in the future:

New technology business
What all the buzz is about for IoT related businesses
How technology can affect our lives

Based on my research/interviewing/experiences/guesses, this book also explains how:

IoT will bring the next industrial revolution
How the change will come at a lightning speed
Such lifestyle change will bring profits on an unimaginable scale

You will love this book if you are an average person who is interested in trends in the upcoming future.
IoT 2030 is a non-fiction book that speaks to tech-friendly and entrepreneurial go-getters who are looking at what's next and how it impacts our lives for the first time.
 
The Book - [IoT 2030]
The book is written in six parts after the introduction, and it touches the core aspect of how the Internet of Things will change and improve our lives for the better as well as touching on social issues like cybersecurity that is growing at the alarming rate with the current geopolitical issues that is happening around us.Part 1 → Smart home

Turning your appliance as an information hub
Devices of the future for your home
Countless Applications

 
Part 2 →5G and IoT/ is it platform or content that drives IoT proliferation?

What we need for it to happen. What comes first?
Public and Private: Smart city
The Technology Miracle
Providing infrastructure for future generation?

 
Part 3 →MEDTECH

Virtual doctors
Finding a Doctor that fits
Knowing your medicine
The issue with medical devices

 
Part 4 →Connectivity and manufacturing

Introduction of Smart Manufacturing
From high technology requirement to high flexibility requirement
Past instances of using data for operational efficiency
The need for smart manufacturing
Private and Public Sector
It's manufacturing that brings growth

 
Part 5 →From simple past to a complex future

Fast fashion and proof of the need for nimbleness
The Zara's of the future: smaller but more powerful
The adaptive mindset
Legacy technology and speed
Delivering food on time
Flexibility

 
Part 6 →Cybersecurity

Cybersecurity as a serious issue
The implementation of new network and privacy.
State entity and Private companies
Cheaper connectivity and the need for security companies

 
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in October 2019
The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this October 2019.
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book(“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...
 
About the Author
CREDIBILITY: Chong Hwan Kim is working at Samsung who is also currently pursuing his full-time MBA at Georgetown, He has lived in 6 different countries (Norway, India, Indonesia, Swiss, US, South Korea) for 20 years and has a comprehensive understanding of different cultures and markets around the world. Chong is also considered highly credible as a sales/marketing expert in the electronic component industry at Georgetown University McDonough School of Business.Chong Hwan Kim is very curious about the future of the information technology and how the future will be paved out before the general norm is aware of the changesOutside this book, Chong Hwan Kim loves talking and reading about different cultures and the social issues that are prevalent today.For more information, you can connect with Chong at ck952@georgetown.edu
 
Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #IoT2030 and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
Thank you so much for all your love and support!Thanks again,Chong Hwan Kim

story:
My name is Jan King. I’m on a mission to empower authors to shape their own destinies – and I need your help.

Wildly exciting – or disturbing and expensive? It all depends on whether or not authors know how to benefit from the current changes.

Too many authors are paying outlandish prices to sell too few books – and losing their rights in the process. They are sought-after profit centers for Print-on-Demand (POD) pseudo-publishers who ask you to pay them up front for outrageously priced production, printing and marketing services  - and then take a large share of what should be your profits.

Authors urgently need unbiased advice from an advocate who can help them land on their feet.

 

Introducing The Author Academy.

With your support and my 30 years of extensive publishing experience and knowledge, authors will be able to affordably access everything they need to write, produce and print high-quality books and ebooks – and sell more copies to people who truly need them. 

The AuthorAcademy.com, an amazingly detailed online and interactive tool, is for do-it-yourselfers – whether self-publishing or seeking an established commercial publisher. This step-by-step resource will include narrative explanations, links, video slidecasts, examples and a list of resources to successfully complete and publish your books.

Author Academy members will be guided through every aspect of writing, publishing and effectively marketing their books, so they never again have to leap into the unknown…waste hours trying to research answers…or spend money on tasks they can easily do themselves.

Because each step and task is laid out in detail and in order, authors will know what to do and when and how to do it. They will also know how to find (and work with) good and affordable outside resources when they choose. They will no longer be easy prey for greedy PODs.

This program will be available for a low one-time membership fee. That’s right: no additional fees ever.

We will keep it updated so it is always available with current information (even if you publish multiple books over multiple years).

 

Check out our progress.

Although Author Academy is a work in progress, I hope you will visit www.AuthorAcademy.com.  Log in as user: me, password: me. Under ‘Pages’ you will get a sense of the comprehensive 100 pages we have planned for the site.

Then, to get a peek at some actual content, click “One Perfect Chapter” on the alphabetical menu. You can also read the following 3 pages by clicking the “next” button at the bottom of each page.

The Author Academy is based on the Author Roadmap, a list of all the steps to becoming an author.

You won’t find fluff, just the essential information you need to become an author of note.

 

 Experience the excitement.

To understand what the book publishing process feels like from the author perspective, read our first site, www.AssistedSelfPublishing.com. The highlight of the site is a blog which gives a window into how an author works with a professional freelance team.  The blog posts are for a real book in progress, real time and you hear from the author as well as the editor, cover designer, virtual author's assistant and the rest of the professional team.  You learn about the good, the bad and everything in between.

 

Here's a quick historical perspective.

Publishers used to make sure all books were edited to perfection and designed by sophisticated layout artists and illustrators. They prepared the manuscript for printing on expensive typesetting equipment, proofread it twice, printed 5,000 or more copies, and aggressively sold them through bookstores. Publishers and authors made money and created good reputations for important books.

On the flip side, many books went unpublished. The perfect storm of the mid-1990s, brought together personal computers, the Internet and eCommerce (specifically Amazon.com), allowing authors to self-publish, by-passing the big publishers.

 

Exciting times indeed – or not!

Many authors unfamiliar with the publishing process had no criteria to evaluate their self-publishing options. So, as often happens, unscrupulous people with big promises jumped in to prey on the naiveté of aspiring authors. This is even more true today.

 

The numbers tell the story.  

Publisher’s Weekly reports: in 2011 authors paid an average cost to produce a print-on-demand (POD) book of $5,000 - $15,000, with the average number of books sold being only 150. PODs have become so lucrative that Author Solutions (a group of POD publishers) was recently sold to the owners of Penguin Books for an astounding $116 million in cash.

 

Time for authors to benefit from their hard work.

I’m determined to stop this outrageous trend by showing authors how to select the best publishing options for them – not line the coffers of greedy pseudo publishers. As you see from the website, The Author Academy is in development – but authors need these tools NOW. I need your help to hit the finish line ASAP. 

 

How do you know this ambitious project will get done?

The know-how, expert team and many of the elements are already in place. I advise my clients on these topics every day….know what is needed ….and how to get it done.

I have 30 years of experience in all phases of the publishing industry, including President & CEO of Merritt Publishing in Santa Monica, California and founder of eWomenPublishingNetwork. I’ve authored traditional and self-published books on publishing and business planning, developed online training programs for authors and virtual assistants – and am a consultant to publishers and non-fiction authors.

We have carefully done the math and between the site design, content research and development, editing and proofreading, we need $12,000 to do this well.

If we exceed this goal, we will put the remaining money towards creating scholarships for writers with wonderful manuscripts who can’t afford the money to self publish their books.

 

 

Get the satisfaction of helping worthy authors AND amazing Perks. Whether you’re a writer, a would-be writer – or want to support a writer you know -  we have a perk for you.  There are Contribution levels from $10 - $4000, and many in between.

These are offers we’ve never made before – and may never make again, so take advantage! Get the details in the PERKS sidebar, but to highlight just a few:

  • Authoring Journey ebook and Author Roadmap are inspirational and practical reading for would-be or seasoned authors.
  • Writing a Winning Book Proposal (how to get a publisher to say ‘yes’) ebook is a must-read for authors at every level.
  • Personal help from me via webinar, telephone coaching and consulting (recorded if you wish) are available at various Contribution levels.
  • Want to work in the publishing field? A special Contribution that includes two online training programs for Virtual Author’s Assistants or Virtual Speaker’s Assistants certification programs.
  • For you serious writers don’t miss our Perks that include one-on-one phone consulting options (recorded if you wish), manuscript reviews and even submissions to publishers.
  • Finally the top Perk has you in New York City next May to personally meet publishers who are right for your book.

Don’t forget: many of the Perks can be perfect to encourage the authors and would-be authors on your gift list.

 

We’re on a mission to empower authors – let's get started!

Please let me know if you have any questions about the Project or Perks at jan@janbking.com.  Thanks for your time and your Contribution!

story:
Alafia (Peace) I am Khafre K. Abif, AIDS Activist and I have been thriving with HIV for 23 years. I have compiled an anthology of inspirational prayers, poems and affirmations to support the souls and uplift the spirits of People Living with HIV/AIDS.For the last eighteen month the submissions have touched my soul, made me cry, filled me with hope, and connected me to an international community of compassionate contributors who have shared their work to empower my world.

I believe that there is healing in prayer. I know that words have power. I needed to provide this collection of words that will combat the words that are so often hear spoken to someone with HIV. This is my effort to help combat HIV-related stigma. AIDS-related stigma and discrimination refers to prejudice, negative attitudes, abuse and maltreatment directed at people living with HIV and AIDS. The consequences of stigma and discrimination are wide-ranging: being shunned by family, peers and the wider community, poor treatment in healthcare and education settings, an erosion of rights, psychological damage, and a negative effect on the success of HIV testing and treatment. The idea for the anthology grew out of my work as an HIV Test Counselor. Each time I had to share with someone that they tested positive for HIV one of the first issues for them was disclosure.

Cornbread, Fish and Collard Greens: Prayers, Poems & Affirmation for People Living with HIV/AIDS has received submission from Africa, America, Europe, and South America. Contributors have provided their work in their indigenous language with an English translation. I want to shares this anthology with the international community who created it. As you are reading this it is quite possible that you know someone living with HIV/AIDS. If you do then they have shared their status with you. Let us consider all of those who still haven’t disclosed to their mother, father, sister/brother or even their faith community. What place to they go to as a source of support and inspiration?

Poets featured in the forthcoming anthology include: Nikki Grimes, Serena T. Wills, Reginald T. Jackson, Sharaledon D. Brave, r. witherspoon, Samiya Bashir, Storme Webber, Carl Hancock Rux, Tim’m T. West, Mose Xavier Hardin, Jr., Victor R. Pond, Catherine Zickgraf, Temujin Ekunfeo, Maria Hiv Mejia, Sandy Rodgers, W. Travis Wright, Vanessa German, and avery r. young and more. 

What We Need & What You Get

Yours sponsorship will support the self publishing project delivering a High Quality Eco-Friendly Printing of Cornbread, Fish and Collard Greens: Prayers, Poems & Affirmation for People Living with HIV/AIDS .

Sponsorship will ensure this anthology is presented in the spirit in which it has been compiled, a quilt of words that heal and affirm the soul. Sponsorship ensures the delivery of an aesthetically attractive book that is produced, designed and printed on quality paper. Sponsorship will ensure that each contributor that does not live in the United States receives one free copy.  In addition, sponsorship will provide for the projects ability to contract the cover art to be design by Javaka Steptoe.

Javaka is an eclectic young artist, designer, and illustrator, building a national reputation as an outstanding contributor to the genre of children’s literature. His debut work, In Daddy’s Arms I Am Tall: African Americans Celebrating Fathers, earned him the Coretta Scott King Illustrator Award, a nomination for Outstanding Children’s Literature Work at the 1998 NAACP Image Awards, a finalist ranking for the Bluebonnet Award for Excellence in Children’s Books, and countless other honors. His books, Do You Know What I’ll Do? authored by Charlotte Zolotow and A Pocketful of Poems authored by Nikki Grimes, received starred reviews from both Publishers Weekly and the ALA Booklist. Hot Day on Abbott Avenue, written by Karen English, received the 2005 Jane Addams Children’s Book Award. Steptoe is also the author/illustrator of The Jones Family Express. His most recent illustration projects include Rain Play by Cynthia Cotten, published in 2008 and Amiri and Odette: A Love Story by multi award winning author Walter Dean Myers, forthcoming in January 2009. http://www.javaka.com/bio.html

Your sponsorship will provide the resources secure editor photo head shot be international creative artist and photographer Duane Cramer http://www.duanecramer.com/start.html http://www.greaterthan.org/heroes/year-2006/duane-cramer/

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can post the campaign link of your Facebook page, send emails to your social network, log on the campaign link and post comments. You can spread the word about this project and share it with your social network on Twitter and raise the GoGo Factor for Cornbread, Fish and Collard Greens: Prayers, Poems & Affirmation for People Living with HIV/AIDS. Use the share tools to push this project out to your community.

story:
Story Behind Defying the Order

Defying the Order is a book that explores the relationship between birth order, mental health, and mindset. It focuses on creating an awareness and understanding of the science of birth order and how we can alter our mindset to combat the effects.

My name is Anjali Badwal and I am the author of Defying the Order. I wrote this book because of my experiences and those of my friends and family with mental health challenges, as well as my intrigue in birth order that comes from growing up as the oldest of four siblings.

My hope is that in reading this book, you will discover the effects birth order can have and how we can re-frame our mindset. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the concept of a growth mindset. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you face any challenges you may come across in life and help to better the lives of everyone as a community.

In this book, you'll learn about the the relationship between birth order and susceptibility to mental illnesses, focusing on how it can be combated through re-framing the mind. You'll hear stories such as...

  • A youngest sister growing up in the shadow of her older sister, but changing her mindset to pursue her dream career and change the lives of others.
  • How a parent’s own birth order has affected her style of parenting.
  • The struggle of generation gaps in comprehending and communicating mental health struggles.
You will love this book if you are a parent, sibling, or are simply interested in birth order, psychology, family dynamics, mental health, and mindset.

Defying the Order is a nonfiction book that speaks to today’s youth and parents who want to look at birth order and mindset in a new way.
 

The Book - Defying the Order

The book is written in 4 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. In this section you will learn about the history of birth order and the story of Fatema, a youngest child who pursued the career of a mindset coach.

Part 2 contains chapters 5-10. In this part you will gain insight on the commonalities of each respective birth order through shared stories.

Part 3 contains chapters 11-13. This part will educate you on how mindsets are changed.

Part 4 contains chapters 14-16. In the final section, I share stories of parents that emphasize how changing mindsets is a community based effort.

Fifty percent of profits made beyond my $5000 goal will go towards the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health Foundation (CAMH Foundation) The foundation works to change the course of understanding and treating mental illness.

A portion will also go towards CAMH’s COVID-19 Mental Health Resiliency & Coping Fund. Many people have found their mental health plummeting in the face of the current pandemic. The fund supports the ability for patients, front-line health care workers, and businesses to have their mental health needs met virtually.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring, 2021.


When I pre-sell 170 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. 


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

About the Author

Anjali Badwal is a fourth year psychology student at Wilfrid Laurier University who has always dedicated herself to being a strong mental health advocate.

Her passion lies in helping others improve their mental health. The more she helps others, whether it be as a friend, mentor, or volunteer, it only reaffirms her true passion. She hopes to make an impact on the world one individual at a time by educating members within a community.

Growing up she discovered commonalities in regards to birth order and mindsets, specifically within her own family. This sparked her curiosity about the relationship between the two. As a psychology student, she knew mental health and mindset were related, and as she learned more, her curiosity grew which ultimately led to this book.

In her free time, Anjali enjoys spending time with her family and friends, practicing her British accent (Gordon Ramsay style), trying new restaurants, and re-watching some of her favourite movies!

For more information, you can connect with Anjali Badwal at anjali.badwal@gmail.com and at https://www.instagram.com/byanjalibadwal/.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #defyingtheorder and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all your love and support!

Thanks again,

Anjali Badwal
story_txt:
Story Behind Defying the Order
Defying the Order is a book that explores the relationship between birth order, mental health, and mindset. It focuses on creating an awareness and understanding of the science of birth order and how we can alter our mindset to combat the effects.My name is Anjali Badwal and I am the author of Defying the Order. I wrote this book because of my experiences and those of my friends and family with mental health challenges, as well as my intrigue in birth order that comes from growing up as the oldest of four siblings.My hope is that in reading this book, you will discover the effects birth order can have and how we can re-frame our mindset. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the concept of a growth mindset. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you face any challenges you may come across in life and help to better the lives of everyone as a community.In this book, you'll learn about the the relationship between birth order and susceptibility to mental illnesses, focusing on how it can be combated through re-framing the mind. You'll hear stories such as...

A youngest sister growing up in the shadow of her older sister, but changing her mindset to pursue her dream career and change the lives of others.
How a parent’s own birth order has affected her style of parenting.
The struggle of generation gaps in comprehending and communicating mental health struggles.
You will love this book if you are a parent, sibling, or are simply interested in birth order, psychology, family dynamics, mental health, and mindset.Defying the Order is a nonfiction book that speaks to today’s youth and parents who want to look at birth order and mindset in a new way. The Book - Defying the OrderThe book is written in 4 parts.Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. In this section you will learn about the history of birth order and the story of Fatema, a youngest child who pursued the career of a mindset coach.Part 2 contains chapters 5-10. In this part you will gain insight on the commonalities of each respective birth order through shared stories.Part 3 contains chapters 11-13. This part will educate you on how mindsets are changed.Part 4 contains chapters 14-16. In the final section, I share stories of parents that emphasize how changing mindsets is a community based effort.Fifty percent of profits made beyond my $5000 goal will go towards the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health Foundation (CAMH Foundation) The foundation works to change the course of understanding and treating mental illness.A portion will also go towards CAMH’s COVID-19 Mental Health Resiliency & Coping Fund. Many people have found their mental health plummeting in the face of the current pandemic. The fund supports the ability for patients, front-line health care workers, and businesses to have their mental health needs met virtually. What I Need & What You'll Get This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.
The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring, 2021.
When I pre-sell 170 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more! About the AuthorAnjali Badwal is a fourth year psychology student at Wilfrid Laurier University who has always dedicated herself to being a strong mental health advocate.Her passion lies in helping others improve their mental health. The more she helps others, whether it be as a friend, mentor, or volunteer, it only reaffirms her true passion. story:
Thank you!

The campaign has now ended and we are very happy with the result! Thank you all!

The books have been printed and sent out to the contributors, but we still have some left. If you want a book or PDF, you can buy them on our website.

 

The project:

The Larpfactory Book Project will be a collection of 22 Norwegian ready-to-play larpscripts, written in English, and a website containing game materials and videos showing all methods and techniques mentioned in the book. The larps have all been run in The Larp Factory in Oslo and/or Trondheim - loosely organized networks that have been putting up low threshold stand-alone larps regularly for the last four years, and inspired larpers in other European cities to do the same. The book contains everything from relationship dramas, time travel dramas, existential dramas, teenage angst, murder mysteries to straight out comedies.

Who are we?
A lot of people are involved in this project, as writers, copyeditors, layouters, inspirators, supporters, translators, practical helpers, feedback givers and more. All the manuscripts are written by the original larp designers. It is edited by experienced larpers and larp designers Trine Lise Lindahl, and Elin Nilsen (NO), and larper, author and experienced editor Lizzie Stark (US). It will be published by Rollespilsakademiet (DK).

What We Need & What You Get

To be able to print the book, we need to know that people are interested in buying it!

The more people who pre-order, the easier it is for us to estimate how many copies to print. We don't want to print too few, and because this is a 100% non-profit project, we really can't afford to be left with a ton of unsold books.

Your alternatives to support us:

5 EUR: You get a hug the next time we meet.

10 EUR: You get a hug AND your name on our web page.

15 EUR: You get a .pdf copy of the book emailed to you and your name on our web page. 

25 EUR: You get the book and may pick it up at one of the following festivals or larps:

Grenselandet (NO), Stockholm Scenario Festival (SE), Blackbox Copenhagen (DK), Halat hisar (FI) or another place if you make an agreement with us beforehand.

30 EUR: You get the book in your mailbox.

65 EUR: You get a book for yourself, and we give one to a larper in a country where these prices are outrageous. (For example, Belarus, Palestine, Lebanon or others.)

*ALL REWARDS BEYOND THE 15 EUR LEVEL WILL RECEIVE A DIGITAL COPY OF THE BOOK*

The Impact

The larps from the Larp Factory have been in high demand from larpers in other countries. The few that have made it into a manuscript have been played all over Europe, the Middle East and in South and North America. If you support this project you contribute to bringing these larps and the concept of chamber larps out to more people. And you get the chance to play them yourself!

With making an archive of videos of methods and techniques used in the manuscripts, we aim to equip future designers with tools they can use to make their own larps.

Money we receive that is not payment for a book goes to print more books, to cover other expenses in the project (video, web page etc) and to cover possible losses. And international paypal fees. Any profit goes straight back into larp activity.

Support our growing community!

story:
ABOUT THE BOOK: THE STORY and INSPIRATIONS

The Story

Jack Meets Agyu tells the story of an imaginative and adventurous young boy, Jack, who longs to find himself in the books that he reads. Crushed when he realizes he is different looking from all his favorite book characters, he goes off to right what he feels is a wrong. His path leads him to trouble but, also, to healing and empowerment as he reconnects with the stories of his ancestors from the Philippines.

Vibrantly illustrated by Lynnor Bontigao with characters based on Filipino mythology- the sirena (mermaid), syokoy (mermen), and diwata (fairies), to name a few- Jack Meets Agyu is sure to draw kids into an adventure that is exciting as much as it is self-affirming!

Jack Meets Agyu is written by Justine Villanueva in English and includes a translation in Binukid, one of the indigenous languages in Bukidnon, a region in the south of the Philippines. The book also provides translations into Filipino, the national language of the Philippines, and Bisaya-Cebuano, one of the major languages in the Philippines. Additionally, the book features the Baybayin script, a Tagalog based ancient script.


The Inspiration

We were inspired to write Jack Meets Agyu  after sadly finding a lack of children's books featuring kids of color or focusing on Filipino culture.  It was also inspired by personal stories from family and friends, including: 

  1. Justine's son, Charlie, is an avid Harry Potter Fan, but he announced he could not possibly be Harry for Halloween because he had a different skin color. Despite his parents' encouragement, Charlie would not change his mind.
  2. One of Justine's Filipino friends shared that she had once given her young son an illustrated book that featured brown kids. The boy was confused because he had not seen kids of color in books before. So he used an eraser and a white crayon to "fix" what he said was the character's "dirty skin."  

Jack Meets Agyu  tells a deeper story that so many kids of color experience - a feeling of being the "other", of being different looking and therefore not normal or accepted. Through our book, we offer kids of color a way to belong, build their identity, and expand their aspirations by reconnecting with their ancestral stories and their indigenous roots.

We also explore in Jack Meets Agyu the seed of resistance. Agyu is celebrated in the Bukidnon epic, the Ulaging, as the cultural hero who helps the Bukidnon people escape from the oppression of the Spanish colonizers and into immortal life in the heavens. Thus, as a Filipino-American, and therefore of a people with a history of centuries of struggle against colonization and racism, Jack's legacy from his lolos/lolas (elders) and ancestors is one of resistance. Even at a young age, Jack already knows how to exercise his autonomy and right to self-represent. 

 

ABOUT OUR PRESS: Goals and Journey

We are Sawaga River Press, the publishing arm of Libro Para Sa Tanan, A Literacy Project, affectionately called Our Libro, a California 501(c)(3) nonprofit. Sawaga River Press creates children's books by Filipino authors and artists that celebrate Filipino experiences and culture, especially those that are rooted in the Filipino and Bukidnon indigenous values.

Our website is https://www.ourlibro.org/sawagariverpress. 

Our Goals of Diversity and Equity

We are excited to share Jack Meets Agyu with the world because it is the kind of book we wish there were more of for kids to read. Recent data show that while brown kids are showing up in higher numbers in children's books, these brown kids are of unspecified race or ethnicity, and the stories have no visible cultural markers in either the story or the art. Jack Meets Agyu tells the story from a distinctly Filipino-American child's perspective.

Not only are Filipino-American kids missing from children's books, so are the Filipino-American authors and artists. Our press is founded on the belief that we need to advance the publication of our own stories by providing Filipino-American authors and artists professional opportunities.

 

Our Journey As A Press

In 2016, Sawaga River Press published Mama, Mama, Know What I Like? through a successful crowdfunding campaign. The funds that we raised helped us not only with the publishing but also with the development of our nonprofit.

Years after the book's publication, parents and children still share with us how much Mama, Mama, Know What I Like? means to them. We have learned so much in the publication and distribution of our first book and can't wait to put that experience to work for Jack Meets Agyu and for the many more books we plan to publish as we build on the work of our press (and the nonprofit) which focuses on the reclamation of our Filipino and Bukidnon indigenous identities.

With your continued support, we will not only publish charming and beautiful hardbounds that allow kids of color like Jack to see themselves and their experiences in books, but we will also keep growing as an independent press that is committed to cultivating indigeneity and one that props up Filipino authors and illustrators.  

 

OUR CREATIVE TEAM
 

Lynnor Bontigao, the Illustrator, graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Visual Communication/Advertising from the University of the Philippines. She was a member of the InK (Illustrador ng Kabataan), a Philippine based group pf children's book illustrators. She is a member of US based Society of Children's Book Writers and Illustrators (SCBWI) and PuddleJump Collective, an international group of authors and illustrators dedicated to children's literature. She lives with her husband and two children in New Jersey. Her website is lynnorbontigao.com
 

Justine Villanueva,  the Author, was born and raised in Bukidnon, Philippines. She came to the United States when she was 16 years old. She writes about the struggles and triumphs of Filipino immigrants in the United States. She also writes about Bukidnon culture in ginikanan.com so that her two young sons could know more about their Bukidnon roots. When not writing, Justine spends time with her family, teaches dance, and investigates alternative ways of living and being. She lives in Davis, California with her husband and two young boys.

OUR INDIEGOGO FLEXIBLE GOAL: $11,000 AND WHY

We aim to raise $11,000. This amount will pay for the production of the 32 page hardbound book, shipping of the books to the US from Malaysia, perks for supporters, and fees to the illustrator and author. Specifically, our budget is:

$5,000 to produce and ship 1,000 copies of Jack Meets Agyu (8”x10” 32 color pages, hardbound);

$4,200 to pay for creative services;

$1,000 to support our perks, outreach and marketing efforts to share the book widely;

$800 for administrative fees (to Indiegogo and credit card companies).

 

WHAT YOU GIVE, WHAT YOU GET: A TON OF LOVE AND CHARMING PERKS

Of course, the main benefit of supporting us is helping to publish and receiving a copy of Jack Meets Agyu (at the $25 level and higher). Here are some additional exciting perks we have:

  • Colorful buttons with artwork from Jack Meets Agyu and Mama, Mama, Know What I Like? They are super cute!
  • Printable PDF coloring books with original artwork from Jack Meets Agyu and Mama, Mama, Know What I Like?
  • Handy-dandy tote bags with artwork from Lynnor Bontigao
  • A copy of our first book Mama, Mama, Know What I Like? 
  • An author or illustrator visit at a school of your choice
  • Be our guest of honor at the launch of Jack Meets Agyu 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Like any independent small press, we're dependent on supporters like you to fund our efforts. We know we're asking a lot, but believe it's well worth your time and money. There's the risk that we won't make our goal, but given our success with Mama, Mama, Know What I Like? we're confident we have the organization and community to succeed. 

If we fall short, we will remain committed to publishing Jack Meets Agyu by finding other sources of funding.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We know that not everyone can contribute financially. But everyone can share word of Jack Meets Agyu on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram, or through word of mouth with their families, friends, and coworkers! Please help spread the word!

story:
Short Summary

I'm a screenwriter. In 2008, I wrote a feature film script called The Quest. It's a fantasy story that happens in China 7000 years ago. It took me over a year to get it done. But fantasy movie scripts are hard to sell to studios. They involve a lot of special effects and cost a lot of money. That's why studios prefer to invest on properties that have an established market, hence all the super hero movies. So I decided to convert my script into a book, hoping that if the book is successful, it will be much easier to get the movie made. English being my second language, I don't have the necessary skills to write a book (in English) that would be worthy of being published. So I wrote it in French. Everybody I showed it too loved the story. But there is no market for original fantasy books in French. They are all translations from English books. 

What I Need & What You Get

What I'm looking for is funding for the translation. The book has 80 000 words, which is the size of the first Harry Potter. I sent a sample to a few professional translators and I found the one that really did a great translation in the spirit of the original story. 

I took the decision to give a digital copy to any contributor, even if it's only 1$. Am I shooting myself in the foot knowing that very few people will give me more than a dollar? Maybe. But this is how I want to thank you for helping me. If you feel that getting a book should worth more than a dollar, feel free to contribute more. :-)

You can find a sample of the translation here.

The Impact

Getting this book translated by a professional will allow me to present it to publishers or even self publish on Amazon. It will add an incredible production value to the project. It's the only way that movie can be made. I worked so much on this projet, it's very frustrating to see it sleep on my hard drive. 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk is that I can't find enough money to get the translation done. But I will find a way to get it translated. I will not let this project go down. I invested too much of my time in it. It will happen. I will make sure that it does. If I only find a third of the money, then I'll get the first third translated. And from there, It may be easier to approach publisher. If they like the first third, they may want to invest for the rest of the translation. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you are not interested in fantasy stories. But you may also know people who are. Crowdfunding is successful when everyone talks about it. So feel free to promote my project. I will need 9000 contributors after all. That's a lot.
story_txt:
Short Summary I'm a screenwriter. In 2008, I wrote a feature film script called The Quest. It's a fantasy story that happens in China 7000 years ago. It took me over a year to get it done. But fantasy movie scripts are hard to sell to studios. They involve a lot of special effects and cost a lot of money. That's why studios prefer to invest on properties that have an established market, hence all the super hero movies. So I decided to convert my script into a book, hoping that if the book is successful, it will be much easier to get the movie made. English being my second language, I don't have the necessary skills to write a book (in English) that would be worthy of being published. So I wrote it in French. Everybody I showed it too loved the story. But there is no market for original fantasy books in French. They are all translations from English books.    What I Need & What You Get What I'm looking for is funding for the translation. The book has 80 000 words, which is the size of the first Harry Potter. I sent a sample to a few professional translators and I found the one that really did a great translation in the spirit of the original story. 
I took the decision to give a digital copy to any contributor, even if it's only 1$. Am I shooting myself in the foot knowing that very few people will give me more than a dollar? Maybe. But this is how I want to thank you for helping me. If you feel that getting a book should worth more than a dollar, feel free to contribute more. :-)
You can find a sample of the translation here.

And from there, It may be easier to approach publisher. If they like the first third, they may want to invest for the rest of the translation.

story:
The basics

We want to print 10,000 copies of “The Way to Life” in Arabic for free distribution and to make this happen we need to raise 1,450 USD. Please help us accomplish it!

About the project

Last year SGM Lifewords responded to the refugee situation in Europe with an urgent project to translate and print Bible resources in Arabic. Since the beginning of 2016 Who Cares About Me? and Finding Hope have been used across Europe to bring God’s message of care, comfort and hope to refugees. This year we have sent out over 5,000 copies of Arabic literature.

© Angelos Tzortzinis/Getty

With the refugee crisis in Europe worsening, we would like to make another resource freely available in Arabic – The Way to Life. An evangelistic title for a global audience, The Way to Life is a straightforward introduction to the God of the Bible and how we can get to know him. The booklet gently illustrates steps to faith through text and pictures, leading the reader on a journey towards new life in Christ.

The booklet has already been translated and typeset. You can preview it here. The English version is here.

What we need

Here is a breakdown of the cost for publishing the booklet:

  • Printing: 1,350 USD (the cost of producing 10,000 copies of The Way to Life).
  • Administrative costs: 100 USD (the cost of managing the project, including Indiegogo charges).

What if we don’t hit our target?

If we are unable to raise the whole amount, we will continue collecting funds for this project in other places until funding is secured.

If we raise more than our target figure, we’ll be able to print more copies. Demand is high, so we know that all copies will be used well.

The impact

Biblical literature is key for people like Yusuf Denim (name changed for security reasons) in Istanbul, who is part of a refugee ministry at his church. “We have 180 Syrians coming every week,” he says. “We give them food and clothing, and we want to add the booklets that you provide. This is a great way for us to share the gospel.”

In our experience, many of the most missionally minded people are opportunity rich, but cash poor. By supporting this cause, you can help Christians like Yusuf who reach out to refugees with Christ’s love and compassion.

Other ways you can help

Money isn’t the only way you can help! Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about this campaign within your circle of influence to help us reach our goal. Thank you in advance for your help!

About SGM Lifewords

SGM Lifewords’ vision is to present the life-giving words of the Bible – to see hearts changed and lives transformed. We achieve this by freely resourcing people all over the world to share their faith through literature ministry and programmes. Our work started in 1888 and since then we have published well over a billion Bible resources in more than 1,000 languages worldwide. Visit www.sgmlifewords.com to find out more.

story:
Our Request

Even though I have surpassed my stated goal (and my appreciation knows no bounds), some more contributions would help the book's publicity campaign. We all know those prices are limitless in terms of advertising, press relations, flyers and postcards, etc.   

My first book signing is scheduled for Skylight Books in Los Feliz (California) on Saturday, June 16 at 5:00 PM. Please save the date. 



"Hollywood's first openly gay actor and proud father bears witness to his extraordinary life, lived on the edge of death. It wonâ€™t depress, rather uplift you. We are all lucky to still have Michael Kearns with us, now recording his private and public story with an honesty and humor that put most other show-biz autobiographies to shame.â€

 Sir Ian McKellen 

 

The Truth Is Bad Enough, What Became of the Happy Hustler? chronicles my raucous life in the seventies (encompassing one of the Twentieth Centuryâ€™s greatest hoaxes in which I publicly â€œbecameâ€ the character depicted in a wildly successful fiction paperback book) to my reinvention as I entered the Twenty First Century as a longtime HIV survivor, an artist-activist with an extensive list of accomplishments, none greater than being the adoptive father of a black daughter.

My life traverses a period of time that includes the Stonewall Riots, the dawn of gay liberation,the AIDS crisis, and the relentless persecution of GLBTI people worldwide.

That said, The Truth Is Bad Enough is sexy, political, significant, candid, juicy, smart, butâ€”above allâ€”entertaining as hell.


The Impact

     In a recent article in New York Magazine (â€œWhitewashing Gay Historyâ€), Frank Rich says, â€œTo forget any history is to risk repeating it. To forget this particular history is to minimize or erase the struggles of gay men and lesbians whose lives and fundamental rights were trampled routinely for decades in , with cruel and sometimes deadly results. Many of those eyewitnesses to that ugly history are no longer around to tell it.â€

is an eyewitness who is very much alive and The Truth Is Bad Enough tells the history, ugly and beautiful, sacred and profane, funny and tragicâ€”direct from backstage dressing rooms, notorious bathhouses, political rallies, Hollywood soundstages, and the deathbeds of fallen comrades.

Like its author, The Truth Is Bad Enough doesnâ€™t hold back. Known for his blazing authenticity, Michael is a storyteller who writes with self-effacing humor, uninhibited sensuality, a parentâ€™s love, and the gravitas of historical context.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The Truth Is Bad Enough needs to fulfill the publishing costs that include (but are not limited to) editing, design, and publication costs.

The initial promotion of the book will require a sizable budget to assure the bookâ€™s success. There are some fab perks for all who donate. Please consider being an intimate part of this exciting and revolutionary venture. 

Other Ways You Can Help

.Please tell your buds, your peeps, your relatives, your lovers (past and present), your significant others to joing the Truth train and donate.

story:
What is MIND Planner?

 

 

Overview

A better life starts in the mind.

Did you know that 80% of our success and results in life lies in our psychology? 

MIND Planner is a simple daily framework based off concepts of mindset science, helping you create mindset habits that empower your future and best self.

 

First customizable planner of its kind.

Unique modular planner system allows you to easily customize its content according to your own needs. Build your own personal growth, productivity and lifestyle system, suited for you. Refill, remove, interchange planners, whenever you want, wherever you want.  

 

How Does it Work? 

 

Based off concepts of psychology and mindset science.

MIND planner activates higher level thinking for higher level outcomes.

Through a simple 10-minute morning and evening planner framework, this daily process re-wires your mindset in how you think, feel and focus for long-term success when used consistently. 

The daily framework contains prompts designed specifically for your mindset and growth, priming you for focus, positivity and productivity.

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Who is This For? 

 

This planner is great for you or a gift for someone who wants to grow and improve themselves. 

It’s also great for: 

 

  • Personal Growth Enthusiasts
  • College/ University Students 
  • Entrepreneurs 
  • Smart Professionals 
  • Creative Individuals 
  • Teachers
  • Coaches/ Trainers 
  • Procrastinators 
  • Achievers

_________________________________________________________________________________

What You Get in MIND Planner 

 

 

 

Three Launch Colors

 

Size Specifications 

  • Paper Planners:           B5 Size: 6.9 (H) x 9.8 (W) inches 
  • Cover Planners:             10.2 (H) x 7.71 (W) inches 

 

The Planner System

 

Your first MIND Planner order comes with the starter set, which included MIND Planner, Productivity Planners and supplementary planners. 

 

MIND Planner 

Personal Growth Planner 

Supplementary Planners

Supplementary planners help complement your lifestyle or other creative needs. Use for sketching, planning, brain-storm, vision board, journaling, to-do lists, notes – all possibilities, one place for everything, refillable.

Planner Page Overview

 

MORNING

EVENING

WEEKLY REVIEW PAGES

 

MONTHLY REVIEW PAGES

 

Customization Overview 

 

Have you ever had planner for everything?

It gets heavy. Or once you finish a section, that's it. Our planner system provides the solution. It's lightweight, the cover planner is re-usable. You can re-fill, re-use, interchange planners whenever you want, where ever you want.

More planner covers, refill packages, different growth and productivity, creativity and lifestyle planners for everyone coming in 2020! 

 

 

 

What Others Are Saying

 

 

Give the Gift of Growth 

 

There's nothing more powerful than a changed mind. 

Give the "Gift of Growth" to someone special this season and New Year.

MIND Planner is more than a planner, it’s a new system of thinking and living.

Comes in a beautiful white box for gifting! 

How to Help

Whether you can contribute financially to this campaign or not, you can help a lot by simply sharing our campaign and letting others know!

 

How to get a FREE digital copy of the MIND Planner Daily Framework!

1. Click any social share button below. 

2. Email us a screenshot of your post to hello@mymindplanner.com

 

 

 

PLEDGER CORE BENEFITS

What you get when you make any pledge: 

  1. Awesome perks at special Indiegogo price 
  2. Morning Ritual Mastery PDF + Ritual Rhythm Tracker (create empowering rituals)
  3. Join our private Facebook group with access to free webinars, programs, tools and tips
  4. Free Online Program "Mindset Mastery: To Your Best Year" (available January 2020)

 

Risks and Challenges 

We know there will always be unforeseen challenges with any product launch. Although we are experienced in working with manufacturing, we are doing everything we can to avoid these obstacles.

Delayed Orders

Our only challenge may be pledgers not receiving their orders in time for Christmas due to unexpected high volume of orders, or logistical setbacks as we are approaching the busiest season of the year.

Though we have planned in a little over a month of contingency for logistics, we still ask for everyone’s patience in the case challenges arise.

High Shipping Prices for International Orders

We’ve been working months on getting the lowest shipping rates possible since our special planner weighs over 5 lbs. Once we can kick-start this first order, we hope to expand our warehouse to key locations so we can continuously get the best rates and shipping convenience for you. We will have more better options in 2020! 

Updates & Communication

We will keep everyone updated at all times in the case this planner is expected for Christmas. We will inform you of any delays ahead of time. 

Our Commitment to You

Our commitment is to do everything in our control to ensure everyone receives this great product before the end of the year. We are passionate about our mission to help people live better Nothing is greater than having this tool to help you make 2020 your best year yet!

We love you all and gratefully thank you for your support! Please email us should you have any queries or feedback at hello@mymindplanner.com
